AI & Computational Biology.title: Pseudodata-based molecular structure generator to reveal unknown chemicals
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Machine Intelligence, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42256-025-01140-5Yu and colleagues present MSGo, an artificial intelligence exposomics tool trained on virtual mass spectra with masking that identifies pollutants by generating chemical structures that match measured spectral data.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Translating mass spectra into chemical structures is a central challenge in exposomics, making it difficult to quickly track the millions of chemicals found in humans and the environment. Unlike metabolomics, key problems in developing models for chemicals with a larger molecular space include data scarcity, model complexity and proper query strategy. Here we present a molecular structure generator (MSGo) that can generate structures directly from mass spectra and discover unknown polyfluorinated chemicals in the exposome. Trained with only virtual spectra using a transformer neural network, MSGo correctly identified 48% of structures in a validation set and was better at discovering new polyfluorinated chemicals in wastewater samples reported in the literature than experts. Applying probability-oriented masking to the virtual spectra is key to MSGo’s performance. Rapid discovery of chemicals with limited experimental mass spectral data using automated tools such as MSGo is key to tackling the current unknown polyfluorinated chemical crisis. Yu and colleagues present MSGo, an artificial intelligence exposomics tool trained on virtual mass spectra with masking that identifies pollutants by generating chemical structures that match measured spectral data.

AI & Computational Biology.title: OneProt: Towards multi-modal protein foundation models via latent space alignment of sequence, structure, binding sites and text encoders
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Klemens Flöge, Srisruthi Udayakumar, Johanna Sommer, Marie Piraud, Stefan Kesselheim, Vincent Fortuin, Stephan Günnemann, Karel J. van der Weg, Holger Gohlke, Erinc Merdivan, Alina BazarovaRecent advances in Artificial Intelligence have enabled multi-modal systems to model and translate diverse information spaces. Extending beyond text and vision, we introduce OneProt, a multi-modal Deep Learning model for proteins that integrates structural, sequence, text, and binding site data. Using the ImageBind framework, OneProt aligns the latent spaces of protein modality encoders in a lightweight fine-tuning scheme that focuses on pairwise alignment with sequence data, rather than requiring full matches. This novel approach comprises a mix of Graph Neural Networks and transformer architectures. It demonstrates good performance in retrieval tasks and showcases the efficacy of multi-modal systems in Protein Machine Learning through a broad spectrum of downstream baselines, including enzyme function prediction and binding site analysis. Furthermore, OneProt enables the transfer of representational information from specialized encoders to the sequence encoder, enhancing capabilities for distinguishing evolutionarily related and unrelated sequences and exhibiting representational properties where evolutionarily related proteins align in similar directions within the latent space. In addition, we extensively investigate modality ablations to identify the encoders that contribute the most to predictive performance, highlighting the significance of the binding site encoder, which has not been used in similar models previously. This work expands the horizons of multi-modal protein models, paving the way for transformative applications in drug discovery, biocatalytic reaction planning, and protein engineering.

AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 人工智能的最新进展使得多模态系统能够对多样化的信息空间进行建模和转换。我们将多模态系统的应用范围从文本和视觉领域扩展开来，引入了OneProt，这是一个用于蛋白质的多模态深度学习模型，它整合了结构、序列、文本和结合位点数据。OneProt利用ImageBind框架，通过一种轻量级的微调方案来对齐蛋白质模态编码器的潜在空间，该方案侧重于与序列数据的成对对齐，而非要求完全匹配。这种新颖的方法结合了图神经网络和Transformer架构。它在检索任务中表现出良好的性能，并通过广泛的下游基准测试（包括酶功能预测和结合位点分析）展示了多模态系统在蛋白质机器学习中的有效性。此外，OneProt能够将来自专用编码器的表征信息转移到序列编码器，从而增强了区分进化相关和不相关序列的能力，并展现出进化相关蛋白质在潜在空间中沿相似方向对齐的表征特性。我们还广泛研究了模态消融实验，以识别对预测性能贡献最大的编码器，并强调了结合位点编码器的重要性，该编码器此前在类似模型中尚未被使用。这项工作拓展了多模态蛋白质模型的视野，为药物发现、生物催化反应规划和蛋白质工程领域的变革性应用铺平了道路。

AI & Computational Biology.title: CarbaDetector: a machine learning model for detecting carbapenemase-producing Enterobacterales from disk diffusion tests
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66183-zCarbapenems are last-resort antibiotics, but resistance is rising due to hydrolyzing enzymes called carbapenemases. The authors present a machine learning algorithm and web-app to rapidly predict carbapenemase-production in Enterobacterales.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Carbapenemase-producing Enterobacterales (CPE) are considered among the highest threats to global health by WHO. Their detection is difficult and time-consuming. We developed a random-forest machine learning (ML) model, CarbaDetector, to predict carbapenemase production from inhibition zone diameters of eight antibiotics, using 385 isolates for training with whole genome sequencing as reference. Validation on two external datasets (A = 282, B = 518 isolates) shows high performance: sensitivity/specificity are 96.6%/84.4% (training), 96.3%/86.1% (A), and 91.2%/87.0% (B, five antibiotics). In contrast, the algorithms of EUCAST and the Antibiogram Committee of the French Society of Microbiology (CA-SFM) exhibit lower specificity (8.2% and 40.1%, respectively on the training dataset). In this work, we show that CarbaDetector, available as a web-app, reduces unnecessary confirmatory testing and accelerates the time to result. This approach offers high sensitivity and improved specificity compared to standard algorithms and has the potential to improve CPE detection, especially in resource-limited settings. Carbapenems are last-resort antibiotics, but resistance is rising due to hydrolyzing enzymes called carbapenemases. The authors present a machine learning algorithm and web-app to rapidly predict carbapenemase-production in Enterobacterales.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: CarbaDetector：一种基于纸片扩散试验检测产碳青霉烯酶肠杆菌科细菌的机器学习模型
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 世界卫生组织（WHO）将产碳青霉烯酶肠杆菌科细菌（CPE）列为全球健康面临的最大威胁之一。CPE的检测既困难又耗时。本研究开发了一种名为CarbaDetector的随机森林机器学习（ML）模型，该模型以全基因组测序为参考，利用385株分离株进行训练，通过八种抗生素的抑菌圈直径来预测碳青霉烯酶的产生。在两个外部数据集（A组=282株，B组=518株分离株）上的验证结果显示出高性能：其敏感性/特异性在训练集上分别为96.6%/84.4%，在A组上分别为96.3%/86.1%，在B组（五种抗生素）上分别为91.2%/87.0%。相比之下，欧洲临床微生物学和传染病学会（EUCAST）以及法国微生物学会药敏委员会（CA-SFM）的算法在训练集上的特异性较低（分别为8.2%和40.1%）。本工作表明，CarbaDetector（可作为网络应用程序使用）能够减少不必要的确认性检测，并缩短获得结果的时间。与标准算法相比，该方法具有更高的敏感性和改进的特异性，有望改善CPE的检测，尤其是在资源有限的环境中。碳青霉烯类抗生素是最后的抗生素防线，但由于水解酶（即碳青霉烯酶）的存在，其耐药性正在上升。作者提出了一种机器学习算法和网络应用程序，用于快速预测肠杆菌科细菌中碳青霉烯酶的产生。

AI & Computational Biology.title: CryoAtom improves model building for cryo-EM
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01713-3Inspired by the advance in protein structure prediction, CryoAtom builds protein models directly from cryogenic electron microscopy maps, producing more complete models, reducing the resolution requirement and accelerating modeling.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Constructing atomic models from cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) density maps is essential for interpreting molecular mechanisms. Here we present CryoAtom, an approach for de novo model building for cryo-EM maps, leveraging recent advancements in AlphaFold2 to improve the state-of-the-art method ModelAngelo. To accommodate the cryo-EM map information, CryoAtom replaces the global attention mechanism in AlphaFold2 with local attention, which is further enhanced by a novel three-dimensional rotary position embedding. CryoAtom produces more complete models, reduces the resolution requirement and accelerates the modeling. The application of CryoAtom to three large maps demonstrates its ability to detect previously uncharacterized proteins with unknown functions, improve the modeling of conformational changes and compartmentalize the map to isolate nonprotein components. A particular case includes a 104-protein complex that was modeled within a few hours and a minor conformational change of a single protein domain was detected at the periphery when models from two different maps were compared. CryoAtom stands as an accurate method currently available for model building of proteins in cryo-EM structure determination. The source code and model parameters are available from GitHub ( https://github.com/YangLab-SDU/CryoAtom ). Inspired by the advance in protein structure prediction, CryoAtom builds protein models directly from cryogenic electron microscopy maps, producing more complete models, reducing the resolution requirement and accelerating modeling.

AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 从冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM）密度图构建原子模型对于阐释分子机制至关重要。本文介绍了一种名为 CryoAtom 的方法，用于冷冻电镜图谱的从头（de novo）模型构建，它利用 AlphaFold2 的最新进展来改进现有最先进的方法 ModelAngelo。为了适应冷冻电镜图谱信息，CryoAtom 将 AlphaFold2 中的全局注意力机制替换为局部注意力，并通过一种新颖的三维旋转位置嵌入进一步增强。CryoAtom 能够生成更完整的模型，降低对分辨率的要求，并加速建模过程。将 CryoAtom 应用于三个大型图谱，结果表明它能够检测以前未表征的、功能未知的蛋白质，改进构象变化的建模，并将图谱分区以分离非蛋白质组分。一个具体案例包括一个在数小时内完成建模的104个蛋白质组成的复合物，并且在比较来自两个不同图谱的模型时，在外围检测到了单个蛋白质结构域的微小构象变化。CryoAtom 是目前可用于冷冻电镜结构测定中蛋白质模型构建的准确方法。源代码和模型参数可在 GitHub 上获取。受蛋白质结构预测进展的启发，CryoAtom 直接从冷冻电镜图谱构建蛋白质模型，生成更完整的模型，降低了分辨率要求并加速了建模。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Multi-view fusion based on graph convolutional network with attention mechanism for predicting miRNA related to drugs
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Nan Sheng, Yunzhi Liu, Ling Gao, Lei Wang, Lan Huang, Yan WangMicroRNAs (miRNAs) play crucial roles in cancer progression, invasion, and response to treatment, particularly in regulating anticancer drug resistance and sensitivity. Identifying potential human miRNA-drug associations (MDAs) that manifest as resistance or sensitivity relationships offers valuable insights for cancer treatment and drug development. With the growing availability of biological data, computational methods have emerged as powerful tools to complement experimental approaches. However, limited attention has been paid to computational prediction of MDAs. Furthermore, existing approaches typically rely on known MDA information, overlooking the valuable insights available from multi-source data related to miRNAs and drugs. In this study, we present a multi-view fusion-based graph convolutional network with attention mechanism (MGCNA) to predict miRNA-associated drug resistance/sensitivity. Specifically, MGCNA integrates macro- and micro- level information of miRNAs and drugs to construct multi-view node features from different perspectives. The proposed multi-view graph convolutional network (GCN) encoder obtains miRNA and disease features from different views and learns adaptive importance weights of the embedding using an attention mechanism. Extensive experiments on manually curated benchmark datasets demonstrate that MGCNA outperforms existing baseline methods. Case studies of two common drugs further establish MGCNA’s effectiveness in discovering novel MDAs.

AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 微RNA (miRNA) 在癌症进展、侵袭和治疗反应中发挥着关键作用，尤其是在调节抗癌药物耐药性和敏感性方面。识别表现为耐药性或敏感性关系的人类miRNA-药物关联 (MDA) 为癌症治疗和药物开发提供了宝贵的见解。随着生物数据可用性的不断增长，计算方法已成为补充实验方法的强大工具。然而，对MDA的计算预测关注有限。此外，现有方法通常依赖于已知的MDA信息，忽略了来自miRNA和药物相关多源数据的宝贵见解。在本研究中，我们提出了一种基于注意力机制图卷积网络的多视图融合模型 (MGCNA)，用于预测与miRNA相关的药物耐药性/敏感性。具体而言，MGCNA整合了miRNA和药物的宏观和微观信息，从不同角度构建多视图节点特征。所提出的多视图图卷积网络 (GCN) 编码器从不同视图获取miRNA和疾病特征，并利用注意力机制学习嵌入的自适应重要性权重。在人工整理的基准数据集上进行的广泛实验表明，MGCNA优于现有基线方法。对两种常见药物的案例研究进一步证实了MGCNA在发现新型MDA方面的有效性。

AI & Computational Biology.title: ScRDAVis: An R shiny application for single-cell transcriptome data analysis and visualization
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Sankarasubramanian Jagadesan, Chittibabu GudaSingle-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) technology has revolutionized biological research by enabling a through exploration of cellular heterogeneity. However, the complexity of data processing pipelines and the need for programming expertise create barriers for many biologists to explore scRNA-seq data. To address this, we developed Single-cell RNA Data Analysis and Visualization (ScRDAVis), an interactive, browser-based R Shiny application tailored for biologists with no programming expertise. ScRDAVis integrates widely used analysis packages, such asSeurat,CellChat,Monocle3,clusterProfilerandhdWGCNAto provide a user-friendly interface for single-cell data analysis. The application supports single-sample, multiple-sample and group-based analyses, along with features such as marker discovery, cell type annotation, subclustering analysis, and advanced functional studies. Key functionalities include cell-cell communication analysis, trajectory and pseudotime inference, pathway enrichment analysis, weighted gene co-expression network analysis (WGCNA), and transcription factor (TF) regulatory network analysis. ScRDAVis stands out as the first GUI-based platform offering hdWGCNA for co-expression network and TF regulatory network analysis using scRNA-seq data. ScRDAVis provides publication-ready visualizations with data download options in different formats empowering researchers to extract meaningful biological insights and democratizing the analytical capabilities required to comprehensively analyze scRNA-seq studies. ScRDAVis can be freely downloaded from GitHub at https://github.com/GudaLab/ScRDAVis or accessed from any browser at https://www.gudalab-rtools.net/ScRDAVis.

AI & Computational Biology.title: Library size-stabilized metacells construction enhances co-expression network analysis in single-cell data
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Tianjiao Zhang, Haibin ZhuSingle-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) deciphers cell type-specific co-expression networks to resolve biological functions but remains constrained by data sparsity and compositional biases. Conventional metacells construction strategies mitigate sparsity by aggregating transcriptionally similar cells but often neglect systematic biases introduced by compositional data. This problem leads to spurious co-expression correlations and obscuring biologically meaningful interactions. Through mathematical modeling and simulations, we demonstrate that uncontrolled library size variance in traditional metacells inflates false-positive correlations and distorts co-expression networks. Here, we present LSMetacell (Library Size-stabilized Metacells), a computational framework that explicitly stabilizes library sizes across metacells to reduce compositional noise while preserving cellular heterogeneity. LSMetacell addresses this by stabilizing library sizes during metacells aggregation, thereby enhancing the accuracy of downstream analyses such as Weighted Gene Co-expression Network Analysis (WGCNA). Applied to a postmortem Alzheimer’s disease brain scRNA-seq dataset, LSMetacell revealed robust, cell type-specific co-expression modules enriched for disease-relevant pathways, outperforming the conventional metacells approach. Our work establishes a principled strategy for resolving compositional biases in scRNA-seq data, advancing the reliability of co-expression network inference in studying complex biological systems. This framework provides a generalizable solution for improving transcriptional analyses in single-cell studies.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) deciphers cell type-specific co-expression networks to resolve biological functions but remains constrained by data sparsity and compositional biases. Conventional metacells construction strategies mitigate sparsity by aggregating transcriptionally similar cells but often neglect systematic biases introduced by compositional data. This problem leads to spurious co-expression correlations and obscuring biologically meaningful interactions. Through mathematical modeling and simulations, we demonstrate that uncontrolled library size variance in traditional metacells inflates false-positive correlations and distorts co-expression networks. Here, we present LSMetacell (Library Size-stabilized Metacells), a computational framework that explicitly stabilizes library sizes across metacells to reduce compositional noise while preserving cellular heterogeneity. LSMetacell addresses this by stabilizing library sizes during metacells aggregation, thereby enhancing the accuracy of downstream analyses such as Weighted Gene Co-expression Network Analysis (WGCNA). Applied to a postmortem Alzheimer’s disease brain scRNA-seq dataset, LSMetacell revealed robust, cell type-specific co-expression modules enriched for disease-relevant pathways, outperforming the conventional metacells approach. Our work establishes a principled strategy for resolving compositional biases in scRNA-seq data, advancing the reliability of co-expression network inference in studying complex biological systems. This framework provides a generalizable solution for improving transcriptional analyses in single-cell studies.
AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 文库大小稳定化的元细胞构建增强单细胞数据中的共表达网络分析

AI & Computational Biology.title: Stimulus-to-stimulus learning in RNNs with cortical inductive biases
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Pantelis Vafidis, Antonio RangelAnimals learn to predict external contingencies from experience through a process of conditioning. A natural mechanism for conditioning is stimulus substitution, whereby the neuronal response to the CS becomes increasingly identical to that of the US. We propose a recurrent neural network model of stimulus substitution which leverages two forms of inductive bias pervasive in the cortex: representational inductive bias in the form of mixed stimulus representations, and architectural inductive bias in the form of two-compartment pyramidal neurons that have been shown to serve as a fundamental unit of cortical associative learning. The properties of these neurons allow for a biologically plausible learning rule that implements stimulus substitution, utilizing only information available locally at the synapses. We show that the model generates a wide array of conditioning phenomena, and can learn large numbers of associations with an amount of training commensurate with animal experiments, without relying on parameter fine-tuning for each individual experimental task. In contrast, we show that commonly used Hebbian rules fail to learn generic stimulus-stimulus associations with mixed selectivity, and require task-specific parameter fine-tuning. Our framework highlights the importance of multi-compartment neuronal processing in the cortex, and showcases how it might confer cortical animals the evolutionary edge.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 具有皮层归纳偏置的循环神经网络中的刺激关联学习
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 动物通过条件反射过程，从经验中学习预测外部偶发事件。条件反射的一种自然机制是刺激替代，即条件刺激（CS）引起的神经元反应与非条件刺激（US）的反应变得越来越相似。我们提出了一种刺激替代的循环神经网络模型，该模型利用了皮层中普遍存在的两种归纳偏置：以混合刺激表征形式存在的表征归纳偏置，以及以双区锥体神经元形式存在的架构归纳偏置。这些双区锥体神经元已被证明是皮层联想学习的基本单元。这些神经元的特性使得一种生物学上合理的学习规则得以实现，该规则执行刺激替代，并且仅利用突触局部可用的信息。我们展示了该模型能够生成多种条件反射现象，并且能够学习大量关联，其训练量与动物实验相当，而无需针对每个单独的实验任务进行参数微调。相比之下，我们发现常用的赫布规则（Hebbian rules）无法学习具有混合选择性的通用刺激-刺激关联，并且需要针对特定任务进行参数微调。我们的框架强调了皮层中多区神经元处理的重要性，并展示了它如何赋予皮层动物进化优势。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Building a continuous benchmarking ecosystem in bioinformatics
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Izaskun Mallona, Charlotte Soneson, Ben Carrillo, Almut Lütge, Daniel Incicau, Reto Gerber, Anthony Sonrel, Mark D. RobinsonBenchmarking, which involves collecting reference datasets and demonstrating method performance, is a requirement for the development of new computational tools, but also becomes a domain of its own to achieve neutral comparisons of methods. We discuss various ideas for organizing reproducible software environments, formally defining benchmarks, orchestrating standardized workflows, and how they interface with computing infrastructure.

Microbiology.title: Microbial signals in primary and metastatic brain tumors
Microbiology.summary: Nature Medicine, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41591-025-03957-4A combination of high-resolution spatial imaging, spatial proteomics and transcriptional data reveals sparse and heterogeneous bacterial signals in gliomas and brain metastases.
Microbiology.abstract: Gliomas and brain metastases are associated with poor prognosis, necessitating a deeper understanding of brain tumor biology and the development of effective therapeutic strategies. Although our group and others have demonstrated microbial presence in various tumors, recent controversies regarding cancer-type-specific intratumoral microbiota emphasize the importance of rigorous, orthogonal validation. This prospective, multi-institutional study included a total of 243 samples from 221 patients, comprising 168 glioma and brain metastases samples and 75 non-cancerous or tumor-adjacent tissues. Using stringent fluorescence in situ hybridization, immunohistochemistry and high-resolution spatial imaging, we detected intracellular bacterial 16S rRNA and lipopolysaccharides in both glioma and brain metastases samples, localized to tumor, immune and stromal cells. Custom 16S and metagenomic sequencing workflows identified taxa associated with intratumoral bacterial signals in the tumor microenvironment; however, standard culture methods did not yield readily cultivable microbiota. Spatial analyses revealed significant correlations between bacterial 16S signals and antimicrobial and immunometabolic signatures at regional, neighborhood and cellular levels. Furthermore, intratumoral 16S bacterial signals showed sequence overlap with matched oral and gut microbiota, suggesting a possible connection with distant communities. Together, these findings introduce microbial elements as a component of the brain tumor microenvironment and lay the foundation for future mechanistic and translational studies. A combination of high-resolution spatial imaging, spatial proteomics and transcriptional data reveals sparse and heterogeneous bacterial signals in gliomas and brain metastases.

Microbiology.abstract_cn: 胶质瘤和脑转移瘤预后不良，因此需要更深入地了解脑肿瘤生物学并开发有效的治疗策略。尽管我们课题组和其他研究者已证实多种肿瘤中存在微生物，但近期关于癌症类型特异性瘤内微生物群的争议，凸显了严格正交验证的重要性。这项前瞻性、多机构研究共纳入了221名患者的243份样本，其中包括168份胶质瘤和脑转移瘤样本，以及75份非癌或肿瘤邻近组织样本。通过严格的荧光原位杂交、免疫组织化学和高分辨率空间成像技术，我们在胶质瘤和脑转移瘤样本中检测到细胞内细菌16S rRNA和脂多糖，它们定位于肿瘤细胞、免疫细胞和基质细胞。定制的16S和宏基因组测序流程识别出肿瘤微环境中与瘤内细菌信号相关的分类群；然而，标准培养方法未能获得易于培养的微生物群。空间分析揭示了细菌16S信号与区域、邻近和细胞水平上的抗菌和免疫代谢特征之间存在显著关联。此外，瘤内16S细菌信号与匹配的口腔和肠道微生物群显示出序列重叠，这表明可能与远端微生物群落存在联系。总而言之，这些发现将微生物元素引入作为脑肿瘤微环境的一个组成部分，并为未来的机制和转化研究奠定了基础。高分辨率空间成像、空间蛋白质组学和转录组数据的结合揭示了胶质瘤和脑转移瘤中稀疏且异质的细菌信号。

Microbiology.title: CarbaDetector: a machine learning model for detecting carbapenemase-producing Enterobacterales from disk diffusion tests
Microbiology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66183-zCarbapenems are last-resort antibiotics, but resistance is rising due to hydrolyzing enzymes called carbapenemases. The authors present a machine learning algorithm and web-app to rapidly predict carbapenemase-production in Enterobacterales.
Microbiology.abstract: Carbapenemase-producing Enterobacterales (CPE) are considered among the highest threats to global health by WHO. Their detection is difficult and time-consuming. We developed a random-forest machine learning (ML) model, CarbaDetector, to predict carbapenemase production from inhibition zone diameters of eight antibiotics, using 385 isolates for training with whole genome sequencing as reference. Validation on two external datasets (A = 282, B = 518 isolates) shows high performance: sensitivity/specificity are 96.6%/84.4% (training), 96.3%/86.1% (A), and 91.2%/87.0% (B, five antibiotics). In contrast, the algorithms of EUCAST and the Antibiogram Committee of the French Society of Microbiology (CA-SFM) exhibit lower specificity (8.2% and 40.1%, respectively on the training dataset). In this work, we show that CarbaDetector, available as a web-app, reduces unnecessary confirmatory testing and accelerates the time to result. This approach offers high sensitivity and improved specificity compared to standard algorithms and has the potential to improve CPE detection, especially in resource-limited settings. Carbapenems are last-resort antibiotics, but resistance is rising due to hydrolyzing enzymes called carbapenemases. The authors present a machine learning algorithm and web-app to rapidly predict carbapenemase-production in Enterobacterales.

Microbiology.title_cn: CarbaDetector：一种基于纸片扩散试验检测产碳青霉烯酶肠杆菌科细菌的机器学习模型
Microbiology.abstract_cn: 世界卫生组织（WHO）将产碳青霉烯酶肠杆菌科细菌（CPE）列为全球健康面临的最大威胁之一。CPE的检测既困难又耗时。本研究开发了一种名为CarbaDetector的随机森林机器学习（ML）模型，该模型以全基因组测序为参考，利用385株分离株进行训练，通过八种抗生素的抑菌圈直径来预测碳青霉烯酶的产生。在两个外部数据集（A组=282株，B组=518株分离株）上的验证结果显示出高性能：其敏感性/特异性在训练集上分别为96.6%/84.4%，在A组上分别为96.3%/86.1%，在B组（五种抗生素）上分别为91.2%/87.0%。相比之下，欧洲临床微生物学和传染病学会（EUCAST）以及法国微生物学会药敏委员会（CA-SFM）的算法在训练集上的特异性较低（分别为8.2%和40.1%）。本工作表明，CarbaDetector（可作为网络应用程序使用）能够减少不必要的确认性检测，并缩短获得结果的时间。与标准算法相比，该方法具有更高的敏感性和改进的特异性，有望改善CPE的检测，尤其是在资源有限的环境中。碳青霉烯类抗生素是最后的抗生素防线，但由于水解酶（即碳青霉烯酶）的存在，其耐药性正在上升。作者提出了一种机器学习算法和网络应用程序，用于快速预测肠杆菌科细菌中碳青霉烯酶的产生。

Microbiology.title: Characterization of the tumor microbiome of brain metastases and glioblastoma reveals tumor-type-specific and location-specific microbial signatures
Microbiology.summary: Nature Cancer, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43018-025-01073-3Using multiple visualization and profiling methods, Gigi et al. characterize the microbiome diversity of 322 brain tumors including brain metastases and glioblastomas.
Microbiology.abstract: Brain tumors, including glioblastoma multiforme (GBM) and brain metastases, present a notable clinical challenge. Recent research highlights the presence of intratumor bacteria across many tumor types, yet the microbiome of brain tumors remains largely underexplored. Here we show that the microbiome of 322 brain tumors differs markedly by tumor type and location. Using multiple approaches to visualize, culture and sequence bacterial communities, we found that brain metastases harbor higher bacterial richness and diversity than GBM, with distinct microbial compositions. Moreover, metastases in posterior brain regions exhibited greater diversity than those in anterior regions. Pathway analysis revealed enrichment of bacterial metabolic pathways associated with tumor spread and metastasis in brain metastases while GBM was enriched with pathways supporting alternative phosphorus use. These findings provide valuable insights into the microbial landscape of brain tumors, highlighting tumor-type-specific and location-specific variation and suggesting potential roles for bacteria in brain tumor biology. Using multiple visualization and profiling methods, Gigi et al. characterize the microbiome diversity of 322 brain tumors including brain metastases and glioblastomas.

Microbiology.abstract_cn: 脑肿瘤，包括多形性胶质母细胞瘤（GBM）和脑转移瘤，构成了显著的临床挑战。近期研究强调了许多肿瘤类型中存在瘤内细菌，然而脑肿瘤的微生物组在很大程度上仍未被充分探索。本研究表明，322例脑肿瘤的微生物组在肿瘤类型和位置上存在显著差异。通过多种方法对细菌群落进行可视化、培养和测序，我们发现脑转移瘤比胶质母细胞瘤具有更高的细菌丰度和多样性，并呈现出独特的微生物组成。此外，位于脑后部区域的转移瘤比前部区域的转移瘤表现出更高的多样性。通路分析显示，脑转移瘤中与肿瘤扩散和转移相关的细菌代谢通路富集，而胶质母细胞瘤则富集了支持替代磷利用的通路。这些发现为脑肿瘤的微生物图景提供了宝贵的见解，突出了肿瘤类型和位置特异性的变异，并暗示了细菌在脑肿瘤生物学中潜在的作用。Gigi等人利用多种可视化和分析方法，对包括脑转移瘤和胶质母细胞瘤在内的322例脑肿瘤的微生物组多样性进行了表征。

Microbiology.title: Exploring the concept of bacterial memory
Microbiology.summary: Nature Microbiology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41564-025-02185-3This Perspective discusses the concept, mechanisms and evidence for memory in bacteria at individual and community levels.
Microbiology.abstract: Bacteria have multiple mechanisms through which they sense changes in their environment and respond appropriately. In some instances, bacteria appear to retain an imprint of past events that can influence future behaviour, resembling a form of memory. This Perspective explores this concept of bacterial memory at the genetic, epigenetic, biochemical and ecological levels. We discuss how memory can prime bacteria to respond appropriately to recurring stimuli, providing fitness benefits in fluctuating environments. At the cellular level, there is evidence for memory storage mechanisms involving mutations, DNA methylation, or the inheritance of metabolites or proteins that provide a means of accessing past experiences. Complex bacterial communities can exhibit ecological memories of past environments, stored as microbiota population changes that persist or lag after acute environmental change. We review the emerging evidence supporting these concepts of microbial memory, outline some of the key molecular mechanisms, and identify research gaps and potential future applications. This Perspective discusses the concept, mechanisms and evidence for memory in bacteria at individual and community levels.

Microbiology.abstract_cn: 细菌拥有多种机制来感知环境变化并做出适当响应。在某些情况下，细菌似乎能保留过往事件的印记，这些印记可以影响其未来的行为，类似于一种记忆形式。本综述从遗传、表观遗传、生化和生态层面探讨了细菌记忆这一概念。我们讨论了记忆如何使细菌预先做好准备，以适当响应重复出现的刺激，从而在波动环境中提供适应性优势。在细胞层面，有证据表明记忆存储机制涉及突变、DNA甲基化，或代谢物或蛋白质的遗传，这些机制提供了获取过往经验的途径。复杂的细菌群落可以表现出对过去环境的生态记忆，这些记忆以微生物群落组成变化的形式储存，并在急性环境变化后持续存在或滞后。我们回顾了支持这些微生物记忆概念的新兴证据，概述了一些关键的分子机制，并指出了研究空白和潜在的未来应用。本综述讨论了细菌在个体和群落层面的记忆概念、机制和证据。

Microbiology.title: Different antigenic distance metrics generate similar predictions of influenza vaccine response breadth despite moderate correlation
Microbiology.summary: by W. Zane Billings, Yang Ge, Amanda L. Skarlupka, Savannah L. Miller, Hayley Hemme, Murphy John, Natalie E. Dean, Sarah Cobey, Benjamin J. Cowling, Ye Shen, Ted M. Ross, Andreas HandelIntroductionInfluenza continuously evolves to escape population immunity, which makes formulating a vaccine challenging. Antigenic differences between vaccine strains and circulating strains can affect vaccine effectiveness (VE). Quantifying the antigenic difference between vaccine strains and circulating strains can aid interpretation of VE, and several antigenic distance metrics have been discussed in the literature. Here, we compare how the predicted breadth of vaccine-induced antibody response varies when different metrics are used to calculate antigenic distance.MethodsWe analyzed data from a seasonal influenza vaccine cohort that collected serum samples from 2013/14 – 2017/18 at three study sites. The data include pre- and post-vaccination HAI titers to the vaccine strains and a panel of heterologous strains. We used that data to calculate four different antigenic distance measures between assay strains and vaccine strains: difference in year of isolation (temporal),p-Epitope (sequence), Grantham’s distance (biophysical), and antigenic cartography distance (serological). We analyzed agreement between the four metrics using Spearman’s correlation and intraclass correlation. We then fit Bayesian generalized additive mixed-effects models to predict the effect of antigenic distance on post-vaccination titer after controlling for confounders and analyzed the pairwise difference in predictions between metrics.ResultsThe four antigenic distance metrics had low or moderate correlation for influenza subtypes A(H1N1), B/Victoria, and B/Yamagata. A(H3N2) distances were highly correlated. We found that after accounting for pre-vaccination titer, study site, and repeated measurements across individuals, the predicted post-vaccination titers conditional on antigenic distance and subtype were nearly identical across antigenic distance metrics, with A(H1N1) showing the only notable deviation between metrics.DiscussionDespite moderate correlation among metrics, we found that different antigenic distance metrics generated similar predictions about breadth of vaccine response. Costly titer assays for antigenic cartography may not be needed when simpler sequence-based metrics suffice for quantifying vaccine breadth.

Results The four antigenic distance metrics had low or moderate correlation for influenza subtypes A(H1N1), B/Victoria, and B/Yamagata. A(H3N2) distances were highly correlated. We found that after accounting for pre-vaccination titer, study site, and repeated measurements across individuals, the predicted post-vaccination titers conditional on antigenic distance and subtype were nearly identical across antigenic distance metrics, with A(H1N1) showing the only notable deviation between metrics.   Discussion Despite moderate correlation among metrics, we found that different antigenic distance metrics generated similar predictions about breadth of vaccine response. Costly titer assays for antigenic cartography may not be needed when simpler sequence-based metrics suffice for quantifying vaccine breadth.

Microbiology.title_cn: 尽管存在中度相关性，但不同的抗原距离度量方法对流感疫苗应答广度的预测相似
Microbiology.abstract_cn:
引言：流感病毒持续进化以逃避群体免疫，这使得疫苗的研制充满挑战。疫苗株与流行株之间的抗原差异会影响疫苗有效性（VE）。量化疫苗株与流行株之间的抗原差异有助于解释疫苗有效性，文献中已讨论了几种抗原距离度量方法。本研究比较了当使用不同度量方法计算抗原距离时，疫苗诱导抗体应答的预测广度如何变化。
方法：我们分析了来自一个季节性流感疫苗队列的数据，该队列在2013/14至2017/18年间在三个研究地点收集了血清样本。这些数据包括接种疫苗前后的血凝抑制（HAI）滴度，针对疫苗株和一组异源株。我们利用这些数据计算了检测株与疫苗株之间的四种不同抗原距离度量：分离年份差异（时间）、p-表位（序列）、格兰瑟姆距离（生物物理）和抗原图谱距离（血清学）。我们使用斯皮尔曼相关系数和组内相关系数分析了这四种度量方法之间的一致性。随后，我们拟合了贝叶斯广义加性混合效应模型，以预测在控制混杂因素后抗原距离对接种后滴度的影响，并分析了不同度量方法之间预测结果的成对差异。
结果：对于A(H1N1)、B/Victoria和B/Yamagata流感亚型，这四种抗原距离度量方法的相关性较低或中等。A(H3N2)的距离高度相关。我们发现，在考虑了接种前滴度、研究地点和个体间重复测量后，在给定抗原距离和亚型的情况下，不同抗原距离度量方法预测的接种后滴度几乎相同，仅A(H1N1)在不同度量方法之间显示出显著偏差。
讨论：尽管这些度量方法之间存在中度相关性，但我们发现不同的抗原距离度量方法对疫苗应答广度的预测相似。当更简单的基于序列的度量方法足以量化疫苗广度时，昂贵的抗原图谱滴度检测可能并非必需。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Genome-wide association study and polygenic risk prediction of hypothyroidism
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02410-zLarge-scale genome-wide analyses identify hundreds of genetic loci associated with hypothyroidism and thyroid hormone levels, demonstrating the potential of using polygenic risk scores to predict disease onset and progression.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: We performed a genome-wide meta-analysis of hypothyroidism (113,393 cases and 1,065,268 controls), free thyroxine (191,449 individuals) and thyroid-stimulating hormone (482,873 individuals). We identified 350 loci associated with hypothyroidism, including 179 not previously reported, 29 of which were linked through thyroid-stimulating hormone. We found that many hypothyroidism risk loci regulate blood cell counts and the circulating inflammasome, and through multiple gene-mapping strategies, we prioritized 259 putative causal genes enriched in immune-related functions. We developed a polygenic risk score (PRS) based on more than 115,000 hypothyroidism cases to address diagnostic challenges in individuals with or at risk of thyroid hormone deficiency. We show that the highest predictive accuracy for hypothyroidism was achieved when combining the PRS with thyroid hormones and thyroid-peroxidase autoantibodies, and that the PRS was able to stratify risk of progression among individuals with subclinical hypothyroidism. These findings demonstrate the potential for a hypothyroidism PRS to support the prediction of disease progression and onset in thyroid hormone deficiency. Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 我们对甲状腺功能减退症（113,393例病例和1,065,268例对照）、游离甲状腺素（191,449名个体）和促甲状腺激素（482,873名个体）进行了全基因组荟萃分析。我们鉴定出350个与甲状腺功能减退症相关的基因座，其中179个为首次报道，有29个通过促甲状腺激素关联。我们发现许多甲状腺功能减退症风险基因座调控血细胞计数和循环炎性体，并通过多种基因定位策略，优先筛选出259个富集于免疫相关功能的推定致病基因。我们基于超过115,000例甲状腺功能减退症病例开发了一个多基因风险评分（PRS），以解决甲状腺激素缺乏症患者或高危人群的诊断挑战。研究表明，将PRS与甲状腺激素和甲状腺过氧化物酶自身抗体结合使用时，甲状腺功能减退症的预测准确性最高；并且PRS能够对亚临床甲状腺功能减退症患者的疾病进展风险进行分层。这些发现表明，甲状腺功能减退症PRS在支持甲状腺激素缺乏症的疾病进展和发病预测方面具有潜力。大规模全基因组分析识别出数百个与甲状腺功能减退症和甲状腺激素水平相关的遗传基因座，这表明使用多基因风险评分预测疾病发生和进展的潜力。

Clinical & Medicine.title: CarbaDetector: a machine learning model for detecting carbapenemase-producing Enterobacterales from disk diffusion tests
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66183-zCarbapenems are last-resort antibiotics, but resistance is rising due to hydrolyzing enzymes called carbapenemases. The authors present a machine learning algorithm and web-app to rapidly predict carbapenemase-production in Enterobacterales.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Carbapenemase-producing Enterobacterales (CPE) are considered among the highest threats to global health by WHO. Their detection is difficult and time-consuming. We developed a random-forest machine learning (ML) model, CarbaDetector, to predict carbapenemase production from inhibition zone diameters of eight antibiotics, using 385 isolates for training with whole genome sequencing as reference. Validation on two external datasets (A = 282, B = 518 isolates) shows high performance: sensitivity/specificity are 96.6%/84.4% (training), 96.3%/86.1% (A), and 91.2%/87.0% (B, five antibiotics). In contrast, the algorithms of EUCAST and the Antibiogram Committee of the French Society of Microbiology (CA-SFM) exhibit lower specificity (8.2% and 40.1%, respectively on the training dataset). In this work, we show that CarbaDetector, available as a web-app, reduces unnecessary confirmatory testing and accelerates the time to result. This approach offers high sensitivity and improved specificity compared to standard algorithms and has the potential to improve CPE detection, especially in resource-limited settings. Carbapenems are last-resort antibiotics, but resistance is rising due to hydrolyzing enzymes called carbapenemases. The authors present a machine learning algorithm and web-app to rapidly predict carbapenemase-production in Enterobacterales.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: CarbaDetector：一种基于纸片扩散试验检测产碳青霉烯酶肠杆菌科细菌的机器学习模型
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 世界卫生组织（WHO）将产碳青霉烯酶肠杆菌科细菌（CPE）列为全球健康面临的最大威胁之一。CPE的检测既困难又耗时。本研究开发了一种名为CarbaDetector的随机森林机器学习（ML）模型，该模型以全基因组测序为参考，利用385株分离株进行训练，通过八种抗生素的抑菌圈直径来预测碳青霉烯酶的产生。在两个外部数据集（A组=282株，B组=518株分离株）上的验证结果显示出高性能：其敏感性/特异性在训练集上分别为96.6%/84.4%，在A组上分别为96.3%/86.1%，在B组（五种抗生素）上分别为91.2%/87.0%。相比之下，欧洲临床微生物学和传染病学会（EUCAST）以及法国微生物学会药敏委员会（CA-SFM）的算法在训练集上的特异性较低（分别为8.2%和40.1%）。本工作表明，CarbaDetector（可作为网络应用程序使用）能够减少不必要的确认性检测，并缩短获得结果的时间。与标准算法相比，该方法具有更高的敏感性和改进的特异性，有望改善CPE的检测，尤其是在资源有限的环境中。碳青霉烯类抗生素是最后的抗生素防线，但由于水解酶（即碳青霉烯酶）的存在，其耐药性正在上升。作者提出了一种机器学习算法和网络应用程序，用于快速预测肠杆菌科细菌中碳青霉烯酶的产生。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Glycerol-3-phosphate activates ChREBP, FGF21 transcription and lipogenesis in citrin deficiency
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01399-3In a mouse model of the rare disease citrin deficiency, the authors discovered that the accumulation of glycerol-3-phosphate leads to ChREBP activation and FGF21 induction. The study identifies glycerol-3-phosphate as a ChREBP-activating ligand, which could resolve paradoxes of FGF21 expression and clarify the logic of lipogenic transcription.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Citrin deficiency (CD) is caused by the inactivation of SLC25A13, a mitochondrial membrane protein required to move electrons from cytosolic NADH to the mitochondrial matrix in hepatocytes. People with CD do not like sweets. Here we show that SLC25A13 loss causes the accumulation of glycerol-3-phosphate (G3P), which activates the carbohydrate response element-binding protein (ChREBP) to transcribe FGF21, which acts in the brain to restrain intake of sweets and alcohol and to transcribe key genes driving lipogenesis. Mouse and human data suggest that G3P–ChREBP is a mechanistic component of the Randle Cycle that contributes to metabolic-dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease and forms part of a system that communicates metabolic states from the liver to the brain in a manner that alters food and alcohol choices. The data provide a framework for understanding FGF21 induction in varied conditions, suggest ways to develop FGF21-inducing drugs and suggest potential drug candidates for lean metabolic-dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease and support of urea cycle function in CD. In a mouse model of the rare disease citrin deficiency, the authors discovered that the accumulation of glycerol-3-phosphate leads to ChREBP activation and FGF21 induction. The study identifies glycerol-3-phosphate as a ChREBP-activating ligand, which could resolve paradoxes of FGF21 expression and clarify the logic of lipogenic transcription.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 甘油-3-磷酸在瓜氨酸缺乏症中激活ChREBP、FGF21转录和脂肪生成
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 瓜氨酸缺乏症（CD）是由SLC25A13失活引起的，SLC25A13是一种线粒体膜蛋白，在肝细胞中负责将胞质NADH的电子转移至线粒体基质。瓜氨酸缺乏症患者不喜欢甜食。本研究表明，SLC25A13的缺失导致甘油-3-磷酸（G3P）的积累，进而激活碳水化合物反应元件结合蛋白（ChREBP），使其转录FGF21。FGF21在大脑中发挥作用，抑制甜食和酒精的摄入，并转录驱动脂肪生成的关键基因。小鼠和人体数据表明，G3P-ChREBP是Randle循环的一个机制组成部分，它导致代谢功能障碍相关脂肪性肝病，并构成了一个系统，该系统以改变食物和酒精选择的方式，将肝脏的代谢状态传递给大脑。这些数据为理解FGF21在不同条件下的诱导提供了框架，提出了开发FGF21诱导药物的方法，并为瘦型代谢功能障碍相关脂肪性肝病以及支持瓜氨酸缺乏症中尿素循环功能提供了潜在的候选药物。在一个罕见病瓜氨酸缺乏症的小鼠模型中，作者发现甘油-3-磷酸的积累导致ChREBP激活和FGF21诱导。这项研究将甘油-3-磷酸鉴定为一种ChREBP激活配体，这可能解决FGF21表达的悖论，并阐明脂肪生成转录的逻辑。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Degrons and degradation signals beyond short linear motifs
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02056-2Degrons are degradation signals in target proteins to direct recognition and degradation by the ubiquitin–proteasome system. Wang et al. introduce degrons of different types, with an emphasis on high-order structural ones, and discuss how the substrate–E3 interaction is regulated and their relationship with diseases.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Ubiquitin-dependent protein degradation regulates myriad fundamental cellular processes. At its core are degradation signals, or degrons, that initiate substrate engagement and ubiquitination by E3 ubiquitin ligases. Here we highlight how a variety of degradation signals promote substrate–E3 ligase interactions to orchestrate protein turnover with precision. While short linear motifs are frequently identified as degrons, an increasing number of degrons have recently been mapped to high-order protein structures, underscoring the architectural diversity and cryptic nature of degradation signals. Furthermore, nonproteinaceous signals beyond degrons often facilitate the precise control of protein ubiquitination. These additional signals can reside within substrates and E3 ligases or at their interfaces. Finally, we discuss how dysregulation of degrons and degradation signals is linked to human diseases. A deeper mechanistic understanding of degradation signals will guide new therapeutic strategies, whether by restoring defective protein ubiquitination or by harnessing targeted protein degradation. Degrons are degradation signals in target proteins to direct recognition and degradation by the ubiquitin–proteasome system. Wang et al. introduce degrons of different types, with an emphasis on high-order structural ones, and discuss how the substrate–E3 interaction is regulated and their relationship with diseases.
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 降解子与超越短线性基序的降解信号
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 泛素依赖性蛋白质降解调控着无数基本的细胞过程。其核心是降解信号，即降解子，它们启动底物与E3泛素连接酶的结合和泛素化。本文重点阐述了多种降解信号如何促进底物与E3连接酶的相互作用，从而精确调控蛋白质周转。尽管短线性基序常被识别为降解子，但越来越多的降解子最近被定位到高级蛋白质结构中，这突显了降解信号的结构多样性和隐秘性。此外，超越降解子的非蛋白质信号也常有助于精确控制蛋白质泛素化。这些额外的信号可以存在于底物和E3连接酶内部，或存在于它们的界面。最后，我们讨论了降解子和降解信号的失调如何与人类疾病相关联。对降解信号更深入的机制理解将指导新的治疗策略，无论是通过恢复缺陷的蛋白质泛素化，还是通过利用靶向蛋白质降解。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Barriers to translating continuous monitoring technologies for preventative medicine
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Biomedical Engineering, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41551-025-01520-7This Review discusses how continuous monitoring technologies can enable early symptom detection, disease recurrence tracking and treatment response assessment, and how these technologies are being integrated into clinical practice.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: While treatment remains essential, disease prevention often proves more effective in improving outcomes, enhancing well-being and reducing healthcare costs. Despite this understanding, preventative medical practices are still underutilized. Continuous monitoring technologies can help to address this gap by enabling early symptom detection, tracking disease recurrence and assessing treatment responses, yet few of the technologies have been integrated into clinical practice. In this Review, we discuss notable advances in continuous monitoring and the barriers to their translation. We focus on technologies that enable either continuous measurement for at least one week or periodic measurements for at least one month, including remotely interfacing technologies, wearables and other directly interfacing systems, and internally interfacing implanted devices. Continuous monitoring improves disease-risk assessment, tracks disease progression and enhances overall health management. However, broader and more reliable datasets from diverse clinical trials, alongside supportive policies and financial incentives, will be essential to overcoming translational barriers and to integrating these technologies into healthcare. This Review discusses how continuous monitoring technologies can enable early symptom detection, disease recurrence tracking and treatment response assessment, and how these technologies are being integrated into clinical practice.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Chen, Jack et al., Traverso, Giovanni
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 连续监测技术在预防医学转化中的障碍
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 尽管治疗至关重要，但疾病预防在改善预后、提升福祉和降低医疗成本方面通常更为有效。尽管对此已有共识，预防医学实践仍未得到充分利用。连续监测技术通过实现早期症状检测、疾病复发追踪和治疗反应评估，有助于弥补这一空白，然而，鲜有此类技术被整合到临床实践中。在本综述中，我们讨论了连续监测领域的显著进展及其转化障碍。我们重点关注能够实现至少一周连续测量或至少一月周期性测量的技术，包括远程接口技术、可穿戴设备及其他直接接口系统，以及体内植入式设备。连续监测能够改善疾病风险评估，追踪疾病进展，并提升整体健康管理水平。然而，来自多样化临床试验的更广泛、更可靠的数据集，以及支持性政策和财政激励措施，对于克服转化障碍并将这些技术整合到医疗保健中至关重要。本综述讨论了连续监测技术如何实现早期症状检测、疾病复发追踪和治疗反应评估，以及这些技术如何被整合到临床实践中。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Characterization of the tumor microbiome of brain metastases and glioblastoma reveals tumor-type-specific and location-specific microbial signatures
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Cancer, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43018-025-01073-3Using multiple visualization and profiling methods, Gigi et al. characterize the microbiome diversity of 322 brain tumors including brain metastases and glioblastomas.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Brain tumors, including glioblastoma multiforme (GBM) and brain metastases, present a notable clinical challenge. Recent research highlights the presence of intratumor bacteria across many tumor types, yet the microbiome of brain tumors remains largely underexplored. Here we show that the microbiome of 322 brain tumors differs markedly by tumor type and location. Using multiple approaches to visualize, culture and sequence bacterial communities, we found that brain metastases harbor higher bacterial richness and diversity than GBM, with distinct microbial compositions. Moreover, metastases in posterior brain regions exhibited greater diversity than those in anterior regions. Pathway analysis revealed enrichment of bacterial metabolic pathways associated with tumor spread and metastasis in brain metastases while GBM was enriched with pathways supporting alternative phosphorus use. These findings provide valuable insights into the microbial landscape of brain tumors, highlighting tumor-type-specific and location-specific variation and suggesting potential roles for bacteria in brain tumor biology. Using multiple visualization and profiling methods, Gigi et al. characterize the microbiome diversity of 322 brain tumors including brain metastases and glioblastomas.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Gigi, Elinor et al., Straussman, Ravid
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 脑转移瘤和胶质母细胞瘤肿瘤微生物组的表征揭示了肿瘤类型和位置特异性的微生物特征
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 脑肿瘤，包括多形性胶质母细胞瘤（GBM）和脑转移瘤，构成了显著的临床挑战。近期研究强调了许多肿瘤类型中存在瘤内细菌，然而脑肿瘤的微生物组在很大程度上仍未被充分探索。本研究表明，322例脑肿瘤的微生物组在肿瘤类型和位置上存在显著差异。通过多种方法对细菌群落进行可视化、培养和测序，我们发现脑转移瘤比胶质母细胞瘤具有更高的细菌丰度和多样性，并呈现出独特的微生物组成。此外，位于脑后部区域的转移瘤比前部区域的转移瘤表现出更高的多样性。通路分析显示，脑转移瘤中与肿瘤扩散和转移相关的细菌代谢通路富集，而胶质母细胞瘤则富集了支持替代磷利用的通路。这些发现为脑肿瘤的微生物图景提供了宝贵的见解，突出了肿瘤类型和位置特异性的变异，并暗示了细菌在脑肿瘤生物学中潜在的作用。Gigi等人利用多种可视化和分析方法，对包括脑转移瘤和胶质母细胞瘤在内的322例脑肿瘤的微生物组多样性进行了表征。

Clinical & Medicine.title: The role of ecoimmunology in tackling the emerging threats of climate change and the exposome

Clinical & Medicine.title: Different antigenic distance metrics generate similar predictions of influenza vaccine response breadth despite moderate correlation
Clinical & Medicine.summary: by W. Zane Billings, Yang Ge, Amanda L. Skarlupka, Savannah L. Miller, Hayley Hemme, Murphy John, Natalie E. Dean, Sarah Cobey, Benjamin J. Cowling, Ye Shen, Ted M. Ross, Andreas HandelIntroductionInfluenza continuously evolves to escape population immunity, which makes formulating a vaccine challenging. Antigenic differences between vaccine strains and circulating strains can affect vaccine effectiveness (VE). Quantifying the antigenic difference between vaccine strains and circulating strains can aid interpretation of VE, and several antigenic distance metrics have been discussed in the literature. Here, we compare how the predicted breadth of vaccine-induced antibody response varies when different metrics are used to calculate antigenic distance.MethodsWe analyzed data from a seasonal influenza vaccine cohort that collected serum samples from 2013/14 – 2017/18 at three study sites. The data include pre- and post-vaccination HAI titers to the vaccine strains and a panel of heterologous strains. We used that data to calculate four different antigenic distance measures between assay strains and vaccine strains: difference in year of isolation (temporal),p-Epitope (sequence), Grantham’s distance (biophysical), and antigenic cartography distance (serological). We analyzed agreement between the four metrics using Spearman’s correlation and intraclass correlation. We then fit Bayesian generalized additive mixed-effects models to predict the effect of antigenic distance on post-vaccination titer after controlling for confounders and analyzed the pairwise difference in predictions between metrics.ResultsThe four antigenic distance metrics had low or moderate correlation for influenza subtypes A(H1N1), B/Victoria, and B/Yamagata. A(H3N2) distances were highly correlated. We found that after accounting for pre-vaccination titer, study site, and repeated measurements across individuals, the predicted post-vaccination titers conditional on antigenic distance and subtype were nearly identical across antigenic distance metrics, with A(H1N1) showing the only notable deviation between metrics.DiscussionDespite moderate correlation among metrics, we found that different antigenic distance metrics generated similar predictions about breadth of vaccine response. Costly titer assays for antigenic cartography may not be needed when simpler sequence-based metrics suffice for quantifying vaccine breadth.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 尽管存在中度相关性，但不同的抗原距离度量方法对流感疫苗应答广度的预测相似
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn:
引言：流感病毒持续进化以逃避群体免疫，这使得疫苗的研制充满挑战。疫苗株与流行株之间的抗原差异会影响疫苗有效性（VE）。量化疫苗株与流行株之间的抗原差异有助于解释疫苗有效性，文献中已讨论了几种抗原距离度量方法。本研究比较了当使用不同度量方法计算抗原距离时，疫苗诱导抗体应答的预测广度如何变化。
方法：我们分析了来自一个季节性流感疫苗队列的数据，该队列在2013/14至2017/18年间在三个研究地点收集了血清样本。这些数据包括接种疫苗前后的血凝抑制（HAI）滴度，针对疫苗株和一组异源株。我们利用这些数据计算了检测株与疫苗株之间的四种不同抗原距离度量：分离年份差异（时间）、p-表位（序列）、格兰瑟姆距离（生物物理）和抗原图谱距离（血清学）。我们使用斯皮尔曼相关系数和组内相关系数分析了这四种度量方法之间的一致性。随后，我们拟合了贝叶斯广义加性混合效应模型，以预测在控制混杂因素后抗原距离对接种后滴度的影响，并分析了不同度量方法之间预测结果的成对差异。
结果：对于A(H1N1)、B/Victoria和B/Yamagata流感亚型，这四种抗原距离度量方法的相关性较低或中等。A(H3N2)的距离高度相关。我们发现，在考虑了接种前滴度、研究地点和个体间重复测量后，在给定抗原距离和亚型的情况下，不同抗原距离度量方法预测的接种后滴度几乎相同，仅A(H1N1)在不同度量方法之间显示出显著偏差。
讨论：尽管这些度量方法之间存在中度相关性，但我们发现不同的抗原距离度量方法对疫苗应答广度的预测相似。当更简单的基于序列的度量方法足以量化疫苗广度时，昂贵的抗原图谱滴度检测可能并非必需。

Molecular Design.title: Pseudodata-based molecular structure generator to reveal unknown chemicals
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Machine Intelligence, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42256-025-01140-5Yu and colleagues present MSGo, an artificial intelligence exposomics tool trained on virtual mass spectra with masking that identifies pollutants by generating chemical structures that match measured spectral data.
Molecular Design.abstract: Translating mass spectra into chemical structures is a central challenge in exposomics, making it difficult to quickly track the millions of chemicals found in humans and the environment. Unlike metabolomics, key problems in developing models for chemicals with a larger molecular space include data scarcity, model complexity and proper query strategy. Here we present a molecular structure generator (MSGo) that can generate structures directly from mass spectra and discover unknown polyfluorinated chemicals in the exposome. Trained with only virtual spectra using a transformer neural network, MSGo correctly identified 48% of structures in a validation set and was better at discovering new polyfluorinated chemicals in wastewater samples reported in the literature than experts. Applying probability-oriented masking to the virtual spectra is key to MSGo’s performance. Rapid discovery of chemicals with limited experimental mass spectral data using automated tools such as MSGo is key to tackling the current unknown polyfluorinated chemical crisis. Yu and colleagues present MSGo, an artificial intelligence exposomics tool trained on virtual mass spectra with masking that identifies pollutants by generating chemical structures that match measured spectral data.

Molecular Design.title_cn: 基于伪数据的分子结构生成器，用于揭示未知化学物质
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 将质谱转化为化学结构是暴露组学中的一个核心挑战，这使得快速追踪在人类和环境中发现的数百万种化学物质变得困难。与代谢组学不同，为具有更大分子空间的化学物质开发模型时，主要问题包括数据稀缺、模型复杂性和适当的查询策略。本文介绍了一种分子结构生成器（MSGo），它能够直接从质谱生成结构，并发现暴露组中未知的多氟化学物质。MSGo仅使用变压器神经网络通过虚拟光谱进行训练，在验证集中正确识别了48%的结构，并且在发现文献报道的废水样本中新的多氟化学物质方面优于专家。将面向概率的掩蔽应用于虚拟光谱是MSGo性能的关键。利用MSGo等自动化工具快速发现实验质谱数据有限的化学物质，是解决当前未知多氟化学物质危机的关键。Yu及其同事提出了MSGo，这是一种人工智能暴露组学工具，通过对带有掩蔽的虚拟质谱进行训练，通过生成与测量光谱数据匹配的化学结构来识别污染物。

Molecular Design.title: Electrodeposition of magnetic nanonetworks featuring triangular motifs and parallel ridges on a macroscopic scale
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65589-zSelf-organized growth often suffers from a lack of long-range order in preparing large-area nanostructures. Here, the authors develop a direct electrochemical growth technique for preparing ordered magnetic networks without the use of templates.
Molecular Design.abstract: Ordered nanostructured magnetic networks offer a versatile platform for studying magnetic frustration, reconfigurable magnonics, and neuromorphic computing. Their fabrication, however, often relies on complicated and expensive nanolithography. Here, we demonstrate an electrochemical strategy for growing large-area magnetic networks composed of self-organized triangular motifs separated by periodic parallel ridges. The ridges arise deterministically from voltage-controlled electrodeposition, while the regions between them undergo self-organization: cobalt nucleates, bifurcates, and assembles into either solid or hollow triangular units depending on the growth conditions. The global network morphology is dictated by the waveform of the applied voltage. These triangular structures host diverse magnetic states, including vortex-like and macro-spin-like configurations, and exhibit nonlinear responses to external magnetic fields. Our approach combines macroscopically controlled, deterministic growth and microscopic self-organization, providing a scalable pathway for fabricating complex nanostructures. The resulting magnetic networks show potential as physical reservoirs for neuromorphic computing. Self-organized growth often suffers from a lack of long-range order in preparing large-area nanostructures. Here, the authors develop a direct electrochemical growth technique for preparing ordered magnetic networks without the use of templates.

Molecular Design.title_cn: 宏观尺度下具有三角形基序和平行脊线的磁性纳米网络的电沉积
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 有序纳米结构磁性网络为研究磁挫折、可重构磁振子学和神经拟态计算提供了多功能平台。然而，它们的制备通常依赖于复杂且昂贵的纳米光刻技术。本文展示了一种电化学策略，用于生长由自组织三角形基序和周期性平行脊线分隔组成的大面积磁性网络。这些脊线确定性地源于电压控制的电沉积，而它们之间的区域则经历自组织过程：钴根据生长条件形核、分叉并组装成实心或空心三角形单元。整体网络形貌由所施加电压的波形决定。这些三角形结构承载着多种磁性态，包括涡旋状和宏观自旋状构型，并对外加磁场表现出非线性响应。我们的方法结合了宏观控制的确定性生长和微观自组织，为制备复杂纳米结构提供了一条可扩展的途径。所得到的磁性网络在神经拟态计算中显示出作为物理储层的潜力。自组织生长在制备大面积纳米结构时常面临缺乏长程有序性的问题。本文作者开发了一种直接电化学生长技术，用于在不使用模板的情况下制备有序磁性网络。

Molecular Design.title: Van-der-Waals-forces-modulated graphene-P-phenyl-graphene carbon allotropes
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64971-1Here the authors report an allotrope to the nanocarbon family, Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene, for potassium-ion batteries.
Molecular Design.abstract: Graphene has received much attention due to its monoatomic, unique two-dimensional structure, which results in remarkable mechanical, physical, and electrical properties. However, synthesizing high-quality graphene-based composites with high conductivity and ionic mobility remains challenging. Here, we report an allotrope to the nanocarbon family, Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene, synthesized by inserting π-π-conjugated p-phenyls between graphene layers and connecting them via C–C σ bonds. Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene is thermally and dynamically stable, as verified by density functional theory and molecular dynamics, and can be produced at kilogram scale. The p-phenyl bridges swell the layer spacing from ~0.34 to ~0.56 nm, reducing van der Waals forces and enhancing electron delocalization. Electrons in these separated graphene layers benefit from low mass and efficient 3D screening of charge scattering, resulting in high Hall mobility (10,000–13,000 cm² V⁻¹ s⁻¹) in freestanding films. The expanded spacing also enables decoupling of layer electrons and rapid ion storage and transport—even for large ions. For example, potassium-ion batteries using Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene exhibit high reversible capacity, long-term stability, and high charge-discharge rates. Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene holds promise for large-scale, portable, high-performance electronics with energy storage capabilities. Here the authors report an allotrope to the nanocarbon family, Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene, for potassium-ion batteries.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Li, Huanxin et al., Novoselov, Kostya S.
Molecular Design.title_cn: 范德华力调控的石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯碳同素异形体
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 石墨烯因其单原子层、独特的二维结构而备受关注，这赋予了它卓越的机械、物理和电学性质。然而，合成具有高导电性和离子迁移率的高质量石墨烯基复合材料仍然具有挑战性。在此，我们报道了一种纳米碳家族的新型同素异形体——石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯，它通过在石墨烯层之间插入π-π共轭的对苯基并通过C-C σ键连接而合成。石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯经密度泛函理论和分子动力学验证，具有热稳定性和动力学稳定性，并可实现公斤级生产。对苯基桥将层间距从约0.34纳米扩大到约0.56纳米，从而减弱了范德华力并增强了电子离域。这些分离的石墨烯层中的电子受益于低质量和高效的三维电荷散射屏蔽，使得独立薄膜表现出高霍尔迁移率（10,000–13,000 cm² V⁻¹ s⁻¹）。扩大的层间距还实现了层间电子的解耦以及快速的离子存储和传输——即使对于大尺寸离子也同样有效。例如，使用石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯的钾离子电池表现出高可逆容量、长期稳定性和高充放电倍率。石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯有望应用于具有储能功能的大规模、便携式、高性能电子产品。本文报道了一种纳米碳家族的新型同素异形体——石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯，并将其应用于钾离子电池。

Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 信息处理生物材料的构建和组装，常因各种电路的繁琐组装而受限。本研究提出了一种新框架，用于组装编码复杂布尔运算的蛋白质基元件，从而实现了生物分子从这些材料中用户自定义的释放。

Molecular Design.title: Degrons and degradation signals beyond short linear motifs
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02056-2Degrons are degradation signals in target proteins to direct recognition and degradation by the ubiquitin–proteasome system. Wang et al. introduce degrons of different types, with an emphasis on high-order structural ones, and discuss how the substrate–E3 interaction is regulated and their relationship with diseases.
Molecular Design.abstract: Ubiquitin-dependent protein degradation regulates myriad fundamental cellular processes. At its core are degradation signals, or degrons, that initiate substrate engagement and ubiquitination by E3 ubiquitin ligases. Here we highlight how a variety of degradation signals promote substrate–E3 ligase interactions to orchestrate protein turnover with precision. While short linear motifs are frequently identified as degrons, an increasing number of degrons have recently been mapped to high-order protein structures, underscoring the architectural diversity and cryptic nature of degradation signals. Furthermore, nonproteinaceous signals beyond degrons often facilitate the precise control of protein ubiquitination. These additional signals can reside within substrates and E3 ligases or at their interfaces. Finally, we discuss how dysregulation of degrons and degradation signals is linked to human diseases. A deeper mechanistic understanding of degradation signals will guide new therapeutic strategies, whether by restoring defective protein ubiquitination or by harnessing targeted protein degradation. Degrons are degradation signals in target proteins to direct recognition and degradation by the ubiquitin–proteasome system. Wang et al. introduce degrons of different types, with an emphasis on high-order structural ones, and discuss how the substrate–E3 interaction is regulated and their relationship with diseases.
Molecular Design.title_cn: 降解子与超越短线性基序的降解信号
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 泛素依赖性蛋白质降解调控着无数基本的细胞过程。其核心是降解信号，即降解子，它们启动底物与E3泛素连接酶的结合和泛素化。本文重点阐述了多种降解信号如何促进底物与E3连接酶的相互作用，从而精确调控蛋白质周转。尽管短线性基序常被识别为降解子，但越来越多的降解子最近被定位到高级蛋白质结构中，这突显了降解信号的结构多样性和隐秘性。此外，超越降解子的非蛋白质信号也常有助于精确控制蛋白质泛素化。这些额外的信号可以存在于底物和E3连接酶内部，或存在于它们的界面。最后，我们讨论了降解子和降解信号的失调如何与人类疾病相关联。对降解信号更深入的机制理解将指导新的治疗策略，无论是通过恢复缺陷的蛋白质泛素化，还是通过利用靶向蛋白质降解。

Molecular Design.title: OneProt: Towards multi-modal protein foundation models via latent space alignment of sequence, structure, binding sites and text encoders
Molecular Design.summary: by Klemens Flöge, Srisruthi Udayakumar, Johanna Sommer, Marie Piraud, Stefan Kesselheim, Vincent Fortuin, Stephan Günnemann, Karel J. van der Weg, Holger Gohlke, Erinc Merdivan, Alina BazarovaRecent advances in Artificial Intelligence have enabled multi-modal systems to model and translate diverse information spaces. Extending beyond text and vision, we introduce OneProt, a multi-modal Deep Learning model for proteins that integrates structural, sequence, text, and binding site data. Using the ImageBind framework, OneProt aligns the latent spaces of protein modality encoders in a lightweight fine-tuning scheme that focuses on pairwise alignment with sequence data, rather than requiring full matches. This novel approach comprises a mix of Graph Neural Networks and transformer architectures. It demonstrates good performance in retrieval tasks and showcases the efficacy of multi-modal systems in Protein Machine Learning through a broad spectrum of downstream baselines, including enzyme function prediction and binding site analysis. Furthermore, OneProt enables the transfer of representational information from specialized encoders to the sequence encoder, enhancing capabilities for distinguishing evolutionarily related and unrelated sequences and exhibiting representational properties where evolutionarily related proteins align in similar directions within the latent space. In addition, we extensively investigate modality ablations to identify the encoders that contribute the most to predictive performance, highlighting the significance of the binding site encoder, which has not been used in similar models previously. This work expands the horizons of multi-modal protein models, paving the way for transformative applications in drug discovery, biocatalytic reaction planning, and protein engineering.
