Molecular Design.title_cn: OneProt：通过序列、结构、结合位点和文本编码器的潜在空间对齐迈向多模态蛋白质基础模型
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 人工智能的最新进展使得多模态系统能够对多样化的信息空间进行建模和转换。我们将多模态系统的应用范围从文本和视觉领域扩展开来，引入了OneProt，这是一个用于蛋白质的多模态深度学习模型，它整合了结构、序列、文本和结合位点数据。OneProt利用ImageBind框架，通过一种轻量级的微调方案来对齐蛋白质模态编码器的潜在空间，该方案侧重于与序列数据的成对对齐，而非要求完全匹配。这种新颖的方法结合了图神经网络和Transformer架构。它在检索任务中表现出良好的性能，并通过广泛的下游基准测试（包括酶功能预测和结合位点分析）展示了多模态系统在蛋白质机器学习中的有效性。此外，OneProt能够将来自专用编码器的表征信息转移到序列编码器，从而增强了区分进化相关和不相关序列的能力，并展现出进化相关蛋白质在潜在空间中沿相似方向对齐的表征特性。我们还广泛研究了模态消融实验，以识别对预测性能贡献最大的编码器，并强调了结合位点编码器的重要性，该编码器此前在类似模型中尚未被使用。这项工作拓展了多模态蛋白质模型的视野，为药物发现、生物催化反应规划和蛋白质工程领域的变革性应用铺平了道路。

Structure.title: Uniform dynamics of cohesin-mediated loop extrusion in living human cells
Structure.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02406-9Live-cell fluorescence microscopy and polymer simulations in human HCT116 cells show similar cohesin density, residence times and extrusion speed across multiple genomic regions.
Structure.abstract: Most animal genomes are partitioned into topologically associating domains (TADs), created by cohesin-mediated loop extrusion and defined by convergently oriented CCCTC-binding factor (CTCF) sites. The dynamics of loop extrusion and its regulation remain poorly characterized in vivo. Here we tracked the motion of TAD anchors in living human cells to visualize and quantify cohesin-dependent loop extrusion across multiple endogenous genomic regions. We show that TADs are dynamic structures whose anchors are brought in proximity about once per hour and for 6–19 min (~16% of the time). Moreover, TADs are continuously extruded by multiple cohesin complexes. Remarkably, despite strong differences in Hi-C patterns across chromatin regions, their dynamics is consistent with the same density, residence time and speed of cohesin. Our results suggest that TAD dynamics is primarily governed by the location and affinity of CTCF sites, enabling genome-wide predictive models of cohesin-dependent chromatin interactions. Live-cell fluorescence microscopy and polymer simulations in human HCT116 cells show similar cohesin density, residence times and extrusion speed across multiple genomic regions.
Structure.authors_short: Sabaté, Thomas et al., Zimmer, Christophe
Structure.title_cn: 黏连蛋白介导的环挤出在活体人细胞中的统一动态
Structure.abstract_cn: 大多数动物基因组被划分为拓扑关联结构域（TADs），这些结构域由黏连蛋白介导的环挤出形成，并由会聚定向的CCCTC结合因子（CTCF）位点界定。环挤出的动态及其调控在体内仍未得到充分表征。本研究中，我们追踪了活体人细胞中TAD锚点的运动，以可视化并量化多个内源性基因组区域中黏连蛋白依赖的环挤出。我们发现TADs是动态结构，其锚点大约每小时接近一次，并维持6-19分钟（约占总时间的16%）。此外，TADs由多个黏连蛋白复合物持续挤出。值得注意的是，尽管染色质区域间的Hi-C模式存在显著差异，但它们的动态与黏连蛋白的相同密度、驻留时间和挤出速度保持一致。我们的结果表明，TAD动态主要受CTCF位点的位置和亲和力调控，从而能够建立黏连蛋白依赖性染色质相互作用的全基因组预测模型。在人HCT116细胞中进行的活细胞荧光显微镜和聚合物模拟显示，黏连蛋白在多个基因组区域的密度、驻留时间和挤出速度相似。

Structure.title: Electrodeposition of magnetic nanonetworks featuring triangular motifs and parallel ridges on a macroscopic scale
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65589-zSelf-organized growth often suffers from a lack of long-range order in preparing large-area nanostructures. Here, the authors develop a direct electrochemical growth technique for preparing ordered magnetic networks without the use of templates.
Structure.abstract: Ordered nanostructured magnetic networks offer a versatile platform for studying magnetic frustration, reconfigurable magnonics, and neuromorphic computing. Their fabrication, however, often relies on complicated and expensive nanolithography. Here, we demonstrate an electrochemical strategy for growing large-area magnetic networks composed of self-organized triangular motifs separated by periodic parallel ridges. The ridges arise deterministically from voltage-controlled electrodeposition, while the regions between them undergo self-organization: cobalt nucleates, bifurcates, and assembles into either solid or hollow triangular units depending on the growth conditions. The global network morphology is dictated by the waveform of the applied voltage. These triangular structures host diverse magnetic states, including vortex-like and macro-spin-like configurations, and exhibit nonlinear responses to external magnetic fields. Our approach combines macroscopically controlled, deterministic growth and microscopic self-organization, providing a scalable pathway for fabricating complex nanostructures. The resulting magnetic networks show potential as physical reservoirs for neuromorphic computing. Self-organized growth often suffers from a lack of long-range order in preparing large-area nanostructures. Here, the authors develop a direct electrochemical growth technique for preparing ordered magnetic networks without the use of templates.
Structure.authors_short: Chen, Fei et al., Wang, Mu
Structure.title_cn: 宏观尺度下具有三角形基序和平行脊线的磁性纳米网络的电沉积
Structure.abstract_cn: 有序纳米结构磁性网络为研究磁挫折、可重构磁振子学和神经拟态计算提供了多功能平台。然而，它们的制备通常依赖于复杂且昂贵的纳米光刻技术。本文展示了一种电化学策略，用于生长由自组织三角形基序和周期性平行脊线分隔组成的大面积磁性网络。这些脊线确定性地源于电压控制的电沉积，而它们之间的区域则经历自组织过程：钴根据生长条件形核、分叉并组装成实心或空心三角形单元。整体网络形貌由所施加电压的波形决定。这些三角形结构承载着多种磁性态，包括涡旋状和宏观自旋状构型，并对外加磁场表现出非线性响应。我们的方法结合了宏观控制的确定性生长和微观自组织，为制备复杂纳米结构提供了一条可扩展的途径。所得到的磁性网络在神经拟态计算中显示出作为物理储层的潜力。自组织生长在制备大面积纳米结构时常面临缺乏长程有序性的问题。本文作者开发了一种直接电化学生长技术，用于在不使用模板的情况下制备有序磁性网络。

Structure.title: Van-der-Waals-forces-modulated graphene-P-phenyl-graphene carbon allotropes
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64971-1Here the authors report an allotrope to the nanocarbon family, Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene, for potassium-ion batteries.
Structure.abstract: Graphene has received much attention due to its monoatomic, unique two-dimensional structure, which results in remarkable mechanical, physical, and electrical properties. However, synthesizing high-quality graphene-based composites with high conductivity and ionic mobility remains challenging. Here, we report an allotrope to the nanocarbon family, Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene, synthesized by inserting π-π-conjugated p-phenyls between graphene layers and connecting them via C–C σ bonds. Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene is thermally and dynamically stable, as verified by density functional theory and molecular dynamics, and can be produced at kilogram scale. The p-phenyl bridges swell the layer spacing from ~0.34 to ~0.56 nm, reducing van der Waals forces and enhancing electron delocalization. Electrons in these separated graphene layers benefit from low mass and efficient 3D screening of charge scattering, resulting in high Hall mobility (10,000–13,000 cm² V⁻¹ s⁻¹) in freestanding films. The expanded spacing also enables decoupling of layer electrons and rapid ion storage and transport—even for large ions. For example, potassium-ion batteries using Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene exhibit high reversible capacity, long-term stability, and high charge-discharge rates. Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene holds promise for large-scale, portable, high-performance electronics with energy storage capabilities. Here the authors report an allotrope to the nanocarbon family, Graphene-P-phenyl-Graphene, for potassium-ion batteries.
Structure.authors_short: Li, Huanxin et al., Novoselov, Kostya S.
Structure.title_cn: 范德华力调控的石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯碳同素异形体
Structure.abstract_cn: 石墨烯因其单原子层、独特的二维结构而备受关注，这赋予了它卓越的机械、物理和电学性质。然而，合成具有高导电性和离子迁移率的高质量石墨烯基复合材料仍然具有挑战性。在此，我们报道了一种纳米碳家族的新型同素异形体——石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯，它通过在石墨烯层之间插入π-π共轭的对苯基并通过C-C σ键连接而合成。石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯经密度泛函理论和分子动力学验证，具有热稳定性和动力学稳定性，并可实现公斤级生产。对苯基桥将层间距从约0.34纳米扩大到约0.56纳米，从而减弱了范德华力并增强了电子离域。这些分离的石墨烯层中的电子受益于低质量和高效的三维电荷散射屏蔽，使得独立薄膜表现出高霍尔迁移率（10,000–13,000 cm² V⁻¹ s⁻¹）。扩大的层间距还实现了层间电子的解耦以及快速的离子存储和传输——即使对于大尺寸离子也同样有效。例如，使用石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯的钾离子电池表现出高可逆容量、长期稳定性和高充放电倍率。石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯有望应用于具有储能功能的大规模、便携式、高性能电子产品。本文报道了一种纳米碳家族的新型同素异形体——石墨烯-对苯基-石墨烯，并将其应用于钾离子电池。

Structure.title: Degrons and degradation signals beyond short linear motifs
Structure.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02056-2Degrons are degradation signals in target proteins to direct recognition and degradation by the ubiquitin–proteasome system. Wang et al. introduce degrons of different types, with an emphasis on high-order structural ones, and discuss how the substrate–E3 interaction is regulated and their relationship with diseases.
Structure.abstract: Ubiquitin-dependent protein degradation regulates myriad fundamental cellular processes. At its core are degradation signals, or degrons, that initiate substrate engagement and ubiquitination by E3 ubiquitin ligases. Here we highlight how a variety of degradation signals promote substrate–E3 ligase interactions to orchestrate protein turnover with precision. While short linear motifs are frequently identified as degrons, an increasing number of degrons have recently been mapped to high-order protein structures, underscoring the architectural diversity and cryptic nature of degradation signals. Furthermore, nonproteinaceous signals beyond degrons often facilitate the precise control of protein ubiquitination. These additional signals can reside within substrates and E3 ligases or at their interfaces. Finally, we discuss how dysregulation of degrons and degradation signals is linked to human diseases. A deeper mechanistic understanding of degradation signals will guide new therapeutic strategies, whether by restoring defective protein ubiquitination or by harnessing targeted protein degradation. Degrons are degradation signals in target proteins to direct recognition and degradation by the ubiquitin–proteasome system. Wang et al. introduce degrons of different types, with an emphasis on high-order structural ones, and discuss how the substrate–E3 interaction is regulated and their relationship with diseases.
Structure.title_cn: 降解子与超越短线性基序的降解信号
Structure.abstract_cn: 泛素依赖性蛋白质降解调控着无数基本的细胞过程。其核心是降解信号，即降解子，它们启动底物与E3泛素连接酶的结合和泛素化。本文重点阐述了多种降解信号如何促进底物与E3连接酶的相互作用，从而精确调控蛋白质周转。尽管短线性基序常被识别为降解子，但越来越多的降解子最近被定位到高级蛋白质结构中，这突显了降解信号的结构多样性和隐秘性。此外，超越降解子的非蛋白质信号也常有助于精确控制蛋白质泛素化。这些额外的信号可以存在于底物和E3连接酶内部，或存在于它们的界面。最后，我们讨论了降解子和降解信号的失调如何与人类疾病相关联。对降解信号更深入的机制理解将指导新的治疗策略，无论是通过恢复缺陷的蛋白质泛素化，还是通过利用靶向蛋白质降解。

Structure.title: Dynamics driving the precursor in NifEN scaffold during nitrogenase FeMo-cofactor assembly
Structure.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02070-4Nitrogen fixation by nitrogenase requires a metallocofactor built by a dedicated multiprotein machinery. Here, the authors captured structural snapshots of a precursor entering a key maturase, revealing a dynamic process involving extensive structural rearrangements and partial protein unfolding.
Structure.abstract: Nitrogenase catalyzes atmospheric nitrogen fixation, a critical biological process that depends on an intricate organometallic cofactor assembled by a dedicated multiprotein system. Here we uncover the structural basis for the function of NifEN, the scaffold protein that mediates the final stages of cofactor biosynthesis before its incorporation into nitrogenase. High-resolution structural analyses reveal that the cofactor precursor initially binds at a surface docking site before being transferred into a specialized cavity for further maturation. This process involves dynamic structural rearrangements, including coordinated domain motions and partial unfolding, enabling the scaffold to alternate between open and closed states. Additionally, a rear channel extends to the precursor-binding cavity, likely facilitating the entry of the modifying components molybdenum and homocitrate. These findings illuminate the dynamic mechanisms underlying FeMo-cofactor assembly and underscore the functional divergence between NifEN, the biosynthetic scaffold, and NifDK, the catalytic component of nitrogenase. Nitrogen fixation by nitrogenase requires a metallocofactor built by a dedicated multiprotein machinery. Here, the authors captured structural snapshots of a precursor entering a key maturase, revealing a dynamic process involving extensive structural rearrangements and partial protein unfolding.
Structure.authors_short: Payá Tormo, Lucía et al., Nicolet, Yvain
Structure.title_cn: 固氮酶FeMo-辅因子组装过程中NifEN支架内前体的动态学
Structure.abstract_cn: 固氮酶催化大气固氮，这是一个关键的生物学过程，它依赖于一个由专门多蛋白系统组装的复杂有机金属辅因子。在此，我们揭示了NifEN（一种支架蛋白）功能的结构基础，该蛋白在辅因子掺入固氮酶之前介导其生物合成的最后阶段。高分辨率结构分析表明，辅因子前体最初结合在一个表面停靠位点，然后被转移到一个专门的腔体中进行进一步成熟。这一过程涉及动态的结构重排，包括协调的结构域运动和部分解折叠，使支架能够在开放和闭合状态之间交替。此外，一个后部通道延伸至前体结合腔，可能有助于修饰组分钼和高柠檬酸的进入。这些发现阐明了FeMo-辅因子组装的动态机制，并强调了NifEN（生物合成支架）与NifDK（固氮酶的催化组分）之间的功能分歧。固氮酶的固氮作用需要一个由专门多蛋白机器构建的金属辅因子。本研究中，作者捕获了前体进入关键成熟酶的结构快照，揭示了一个涉及广泛结构重排和部分蛋白质解折叠的动态过程。

Structure.title: CryoAtom improves model building for cryo-EM
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01713-3Inspired by the advance in protein structure prediction, CryoAtom builds protein models directly from cryogenic electron microscopy maps, producing more complete models, reducing the resolution requirement and accelerating modeling.
Structure.abstract: Constructing atomic models from cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) density maps is essential for interpreting molecular mechanisms. Here we present CryoAtom, an approach for de novo model building for cryo-EM maps, leveraging recent advancements in AlphaFold2 to improve the state-of-the-art method ModelAngelo. To accommodate the cryo-EM map information, CryoAtom replaces the global attention mechanism in AlphaFold2 with local attention, which is further enhanced by a novel three-dimensional rotary position embedding. CryoAtom produces more complete models, reduces the resolution requirement and accelerates the modeling. The application of CryoAtom to three large maps demonstrates its ability to detect previously uncharacterized proteins with unknown functions, improve the modeling of conformational changes and compartmentalize the map to isolate nonprotein components. A particular case includes a 104-protein complex that was modeled within a few hours and a minor conformational change of a single protein domain was detected at the periphery when models from two different maps were compared. CryoAtom stands as an accurate method currently available for model building of proteins in cryo-EM structure determination. The source code and model parameters are available from GitHub ( https://github.com/YangLab-SDU/CryoAtom ). Inspired by the advance in protein structure prediction, CryoAtom builds protein models directly from cryogenic electron microscopy maps, producing more complete models, reducing the resolution requirement and accelerating modeling.
Structure.authors_short: Su, Baoquan et al., Yang, Jianyi
Structure.title_cn: CryoAtom 改进了冷冻电镜模型构建
Structure.abstract_cn: 从冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM）密度图构建原子模型对于阐释分子机制至关重要。本文介绍了一种名为 CryoAtom 的方法，用于冷冻电镜图谱的从头（de novo）模型构建，它利用 AlphaFold2 的最新进展来改进现有最先进的方法 ModelAngelo。为了适应冷冻电镜图谱信息，CryoAtom 将 AlphaFold2 中的全局注意力机制替换为局部注意力，并通过一种新颖的三维旋转位置嵌入进一步增强。CryoAtom 能够生成更完整的模型，降低对分辨率的要求，并加速建模过程。将 CryoAtom 应用于三个大型图谱，结果表明它能够检测以前未表征的、功能未知的蛋白质，改进构象变化的建模，并将图谱分区以分离非蛋白质组分。一个具体案例包括一个在数小时内完成建模的104个蛋白质组成的复合物，并且在比较来自两个不同图谱的模型时，在外围检测到了单个蛋白质结构域的微小构象变化。CryoAtom 是目前可用于冷冻电镜结构测定中蛋白质模型构建的准确方法。源代码和模型参数可在 GitHub 上获取。受蛋白质结构预测进展的启发，CryoAtom 直接从冷冻电镜图谱构建蛋白质模型，生成更完整的模型，降低了分辨率要求并加速了建模。

Bioengineering.title: Biomimetic Janus membrane with spongy channels for directional liquid transport
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64964-0Directional liquid transport driven by the asymmetric properties of Janus fiber membranes has been used in oil-water separation and moisture management but showing limited water transport efficiency. Here, the authors optimize the porous channels of directional liquid transport Janus fiber membranes by integrating longitudinal channels with a horizontal network.
Bioengineering.abstract: Janus fiber membranes enable directional liquid transport (DLT) for oil-water separation and moisture management, yet conventional pore-channel designs offer limited efficiency. Herein, we have developed a groundbreaking Janus nanofiber structure inspired by the structural characteristics of plant leaves, specifically the pore gradient and liquid transport channels within leaves. An innovative intermediate buffer layer composed of a three-dimensional helical nanofiber membrane was introduced to boost porosity and horizontal interconnectivity. A dopamine-controlled regulation mechanism synergistically optimized the pore structure and wettability of this layer. The resulting Janus membrane exhibits a remarkable unidirectional transport index (1250%), a high oil-water separation efficiency (98.92%), and an ultra-high flux (13860.77 L·m⁻²·h⁻¹). Its integration with textiles demonstrates superior moisture and thermal management, confirming its versatility for applications in oil-water separation, industrial wastewater treatment, and high-performance functional garments. Directional liquid transport driven by the asymmetric properties of Janus fiber membranes has been used in oil-water separation and moisture management but showing limited water transport efficiency. Here, the authors optimize the porous channels of directional liquid transport Janus fiber membranes by integrating longitudinal channels with a horizontal network.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Kuang, Xiaoju et al., Ma, Pibo
Bioengineering.title_cn: 仿生Janus膜及其海绵状通道用于定向液体传输
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: Janus纤维膜能够实现定向液体传输（DLT），用于油水分离和湿气管理，然而传统的孔道设计效率有限。在此，我们开发了一种突破性的Janus纳米纤维结构，其灵感来源于植物叶片的结构特征，特别是叶片内部的孔隙梯度和液体传输通道。我们引入了一种创新的中间缓冲层，该缓冲层由三维螺旋纳米纤维膜构成，旨在提高孔隙率和横向互连性。通过多巴胺调控机制，协同优化了该层的孔结构和润湿性。所得的Janus膜表现出卓越的单向传输指数（1250%）、高油水分离效率（98.92%）和超高通量（13860.77 L·m⁻²·h⁻¹）。将其与纺织品结合，展现出优异的湿气和热量管理能力，证实了其在油水分离、工业废水处理和高性能功能服装等应用中的多功能性。由Janus纤维膜非对称特性驱动的定向液体传输已应用于油水分离和湿气管理，但其水传输效率有限。本研究中，作者通过将纵向通道与横向网络相结合，优化了定向液体传输Janus纤维膜的多孔通道。

Bioengineering.title: Efficient algorithms for the surface density of states in topological photonic and acoustic systems
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Computational Science, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43588-025-00898-3This study reports two efficient methods—cyclic reduction and transfer matrix—to compute topological surface states in photonic and acoustic systems, cutting memory and time use by up to 100-fold and enabling the faster design of advanced topological devices.
Bioengineering.abstract: Topological photonics and acoustics have attracted wide research interest for their ability to manipulate light and sound at surfaces. The supercell technique is the conventional standard approach used to calculate these boundary effects, but, as the supercell grows in size, this method requires increasingly large computational resources. Additionally, it falls short in differentiating the surface states at opposite boundaries and, due to finite-size effects, from bulk states. Here, to overcome these limitations, we provide two complementary efficient methods for obtaining the ideal topological surface states of semi-infinite systems of diverse surface configurations. The first is the cyclic reduction method, which is based on iteratively inverting the Hamiltonian for a single unit cell, and the other is the transfer matrix method, which relies on eigenanalysis of a transfer matrix for a pair of unit cells. Numerical benchmarks, including gyromagnetic photonic crystals, valley photonic crystals, spin-Hall acoustic crystals and quadrupole photonic crystals, jointly show that both methods can effectively sort out the boundary modes via the surface density of states, at reduced computational cost and increased speed. Our computational schemes enable direct comparisons with near-field scanning measurements, thereby expediting the exploration of topological artificial materials and the design of topological devices. This study reports two efficient methods—cyclic reduction and transfer matrix—to compute topological surface states in photonic and acoustic systems, cutting memory and time use by up to 100-fold and enabling the faster design of advanced topological devices.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Sha, Yi-Xin et al., Yang, Yi
Bioengineering.title_cn: 拓扑光子和声学系统中表面态密度的高效算法
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 拓扑光子学和声学因其在表面操纵光和声的能力而引起了广泛的研究兴趣。超胞技术是计算这些边界效应的传统标准方法，但随着超胞尺寸的增大，该方法需要越来越大的计算资源。此外，它在区分相对边界处的表面态以及由于有限尺寸效应而区分体态方面存在不足。为了克服这些局限性，我们提出了两种互补的高效方法，用于获取具有不同表面构型的半无限系统的理想拓扑表面态。第一种是循环约化法，它基于迭代反演单个晶胞的哈密顿量；另一种是传输矩阵法，它依赖于一对晶胞的传输矩阵的特征分析。数值基准测试，包括旋磁光子晶体、谷光子晶体、自旋霍尔声学晶体和四极光子晶体，共同表明这两种方法都能通过表面态密度有效地识别边界模式，同时降低了计算成本并提高了速度。我们的计算方案能够与近场扫描测量进行直接比较，从而加速拓扑人工材料的探索和拓扑器件的设计。本研究报告了两种高效方法——循环约化法和传输矩阵法——用于计算光子和声学系统中的拓扑表面态，可将内存和时间使用量减少高达100倍，并能加速先进拓扑器件的设计。

Bioengineering.title: Barriers to translating continuous monitoring technologies for preventative medicine
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Biomedical Engineering, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41551-025-01520-7This Review discusses how continuous monitoring technologies can enable early symptom detection, disease recurrence tracking and treatment response assessment, and how these technologies are being integrated into clinical practice.
Bioengineering.abstract: While treatment remains essential, disease prevention often proves more effective in improving outcomes, enhancing well-being and reducing healthcare costs. Despite this understanding, preventative medical practices are still underutilized. Continuous monitoring technologies can help to address this gap by enabling early symptom detection, tracking disease recurrence and assessing treatment responses, yet few of the technologies have been integrated into clinical practice. In this Review, we discuss notable advances in continuous monitoring and the barriers to their translation. We focus on technologies that enable either continuous measurement for at least one week or periodic measurements for at least one month, including remotely interfacing technologies, wearables and other directly interfacing systems, and internally interfacing implanted devices. Continuous monitoring improves disease-risk assessment, tracks disease progression and enhances overall health management. However, broader and more reliable datasets from diverse clinical trials, alongside supportive policies and financial incentives, will be essential to overcoming translational barriers and to integrating these technologies into healthcare. This Review discusses how continuous monitoring technologies can enable early symptom detection, disease recurrence tracking and treatment response assessment, and how these technologies are being integrated into clinical practice.

Cancer.abstract: Gliomas and brain metastases are associated with poor prognosis, necessitating a deeper understanding of brain tumor biology and the development of effective therapeutic strategies. Spatial analyses revealed significant correlations between bacterial 16S signals and antimicrobial and immunometabolic signatures at regional, neighborhood and cellular levels. Furthermore, intratumoral 16S bacterial signals showed sequence overlap with matched oral and gut microbiota, suggesting a possible connection with distant communities. Together, these findings introduce microbial elements as a component of the brain tumor microenvironment and lay the foundation for future mechanistic and translational studies. Cancer.abstract: Despite the well-known role of the transforming growth factor-β (TGFβ) pathway in cancer progression, therapies targeting it have largely failed in the clinic. This suggests our understanding of TGFβ’s function is incomplete. Therefore, broadly blocking the TGFβ pathway can inadvertently release a natural brake on tumor growth. Based on this insight, we demonstrate that co-targeting this metabolic vulnerability with an inhibitor (devimistat) alongside an anti-TGFβ agent significantly enhances therapeutic efficacy in gastric cancer models. This combination approach presents a promising strategy to overcome the limitations of current therapies. The role of TGFβ in cancer is paradoxical and context-dependent. Here, the authors discover that a preserved, DLD-mediated metabolic suppression by TGFβ undermines anti-TGFβ therapy, promoting gastric cancer growth.

Cancer.title: Characterization of the tumor microbiome of brain metastases and glioblastoma reveals tumor-type-specific and location-specific microbial signatures
Cancer.summary: Nature Cancer, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43018-025-01073-3Using multiple visualization and profiling methods, Gigi et al. characterize the microbiome diversity of 322 brain tumors including brain metastases and glioblastomas.
Cancer.abstract: Brain tumors, including glioblastoma multiforme (GBM) and brain metastases, present a notable clinical challenge. Recent research highlights the presence of intratumor bacteria across many tumor types, yet the microbiome of brain tumors remains largely underexplored. Here we show that the microbiome of 322 brain tumors differs markedly by tumor type and location. Using multiple approaches to visualize, culture and sequence bacterial communities, we found that brain metastases harbor higher bacterial richness and diversity than GBM, with distinct microbial compositions. Moreover, metastases in posterior brain regions exhibited greater diversity than those in anterior regions. Pathway analysis revealed enrichment of bacterial metabolic pathways associated with tumor spread and metastasis in brain metastases while GBM was enriched with pathways supporting alternative phosphorus use. These findings provide valuable insights into the microbial landscape of brain tumors, highlighting tumor-type-specific and location-specific variation and suggesting potential roles for bacteria in brain tumor biology. Cancer.title: Multi-view fusion based on graph convolutional network with attention mechanism for predicting miRNA related to drugs
Cancer.summary: by Nan Sheng, Yunzhi Liu, Ling Gao, Lei Wang, Lan Huang, Yan WangMicroRNAs (miRNAs) play crucial roles in cancer progression, invasion, and response to treatment, particularly in regulating anticancer drug resistance and sensitivity. Identifying potential human miRNA-drug associations (MDAs) that manifest as resistance or sensitivity relationships offers valuable insights for cancer treatment and drug development. With the growing availability of biological data, computational methods have emerged as powerful tools to complement experimental approaches. However, limited attention has been paid to computational prediction of MDAs. Furthermore, existing approaches typically rely on known MDA information, overlooking the valuable insights available from multi-source data related to miRNAs and drugs. In this study, we present a multi-view fusion-based graph convolutional network with attention mechanism (MGCNA) to predict miRNA-associated drug resistance/sensitivity. Specifically, MGCNA integrates macro- and micro- level information of miRNAs and drugs to construct multi-view node features from different perspectives. The proposed multi-view graph convolutional network (GCN) encoder obtains miRNA and disease features from different views and learns adaptive importance weights of the embedding using an attention mechanism. Extensive experiments on manually curated benchmark datasets demonstrate that MGCNA outperforms existing baseline methods. Case studies of two common drugs further establish MGCNA’s effectiveness in discovering novel MDAs.

Metabolism.abstract: Citrin deficiency (CD) is caused by the inactivation of SLC25A13, a mitochondrial membrane protein required to move electrons from cytosolic NADH to the mitochondrial matrix in hepatocytes. Metabolism.abstract_cn: 瓜氨酸缺乏症（CD）是由SLC25A13失活引起的，SLC25A13是一种线粒体膜蛋白，在肝细胞中负责将胞质NADH的电子转移至线粒体基质。瓜氨酸缺乏症患者不喜欢甜食。本研究表明，SLC25A13的缺失导致甘油-3-磷酸（G3P）的积累，进而激活碳水化合物反应元件结合蛋白（ChREBP），使其转录FGF21。FGF21在大脑中发挥作用，抑制甜食和酒精的摄入，并转录驱动脂肪生成的关键基因。小鼠和人体数据表明，G3P-ChREBP是Randle循环的一个机制组成部分，它导致代谢功能障碍相关脂肪性肝病，并构成了一个系统，该系统以改变食物和酒精选择的方式，将肝脏的代谢状态传递给大脑。这些数据为理解FGF21在不同条件下的诱导提供了框架，提出了开发FGF21诱导药物的方法，并为瘦型代谢功能障碍相关脂肪性肝病以及支持瓜氨酸缺乏症中尿素循环功能提供了潜在的候选药物。在一个罕见病瓜氨酸缺乏症的小鼠模型中，作者发现甘油-3-磷酸的积累导致ChREBP激活和FGF21诱导。这项研究将甘油-3-磷酸鉴定为一种ChREBP激活配体，这可能解决FGF21表达的悖论，并阐明脂肪生成转录的逻辑。

Metabolism.title: Dynamics driving the precursor in NifEN scaffold during nitrogenase FeMo-cofactor assembly
Metabolism.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02070-4Nitrogen fixation by nitrogenase requires a metallocofactor built by a dedicated multiprotein machinery. Here, the authors captured structural snapshots of a precursor entering a key maturase, revealing a dynamic process involving extensive structural rearrangements and partial protein unfolding.
Metabolism.abstract: Nitrogenase catalyzes atmospheric nitrogen fixation, a critical biological process that depends on an intricate organometallic cofactor assembled by a dedicated multiprotein system. Here we uncover the structural basis for the function of NifEN, the scaffold protein that mediates the final stages of cofactor biosynthesis before its incorporation into nitrogenase. High-resolution structural analyses reveal that the cofactor precursor initially binds at a surface docking site before being transferred into a specialized cavity for further maturation. This process involves dynamic structural rearrangements, including coordinated domain motions and partial unfolding, enabling the scaffold to alternate between open and closed states. Additionally, a rear channel extends to the precursor-binding cavity, likely facilitating the entry of the modifying components molybdenum and homocitrate. These findings illuminate the dynamic mechanisms underlying FeMo-cofactor assembly and underscore the functional divergence between NifEN, the biosynthetic scaffold, and NifDK, the catalytic component of nitrogenase. Nitrogen fixation by nitrogenase requires a metallocofactor built by a dedicated multiprotein machinery. Here, the authors captured structural snapshots of a precursor entering a key maturase, revealing a dynamic process involving extensive structural rearrangements and partial protein unfolding.

Metabolism.title_cn: 固氮酶FeMo-辅因子组装过程中NifEN支架内前体的动态学
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 固氮酶催化大气固氮，这是一个关键的生物学过程，它依赖于一个由专门多蛋白系统组装的复杂有机金属辅因子。在此，我们揭示了NifEN（一种支架蛋白）功能的结构基础，该蛋白在辅因子掺入固氮酶之前介导其生物合成的最后阶段。高分辨率结构分析表明，辅因子前体最初结合在一个表面停靠位点，然后被转移到一个专门的腔体中进行进一步成熟。这一过程涉及动态的结构重排，包括协调的结构域运动和部分解折叠，使支架能够在开放和闭合状态之间交替。此外，一个后部通道延伸至前体结合腔，可能有助于修饰组分钼和高柠檬酸的进入。这些发现阐明了FeMo-辅因子组装的动态机制，并强调了NifEN（生物合成支架）与NifDK（固氮酶的催化组分）之间的功能分歧。固氮酶的固氮作用需要一个由专门多蛋白机器构建的金属辅因子。本研究中，作者捕获了前体进入关键成熟酶的结构快照，揭示了一个涉及广泛结构重排和部分蛋白质解折叠的动态过程。

Drug Discovery.title: A preserved TGFβ cytostatic response through DLD-mediated metabolic modulation undermines anti-TGFβ therapy in gastric cancer
Drug Discovery.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64997-5The role of TGFβ in cancer is paradoxical and context-dependent. Here, the authors discover that a preserved, DLD-mediated metabolic suppression by TGFβ undermines anti-TGFβ therapy, promoting gastric cancer growth.
Drug Discovery.abstract: Despite the well-known role of the transforming growth factor-β (TGFβ) pathway in cancer progression, therapies targeting it have largely failed in the clinic. This suggests our understanding of TGFβ’s function is incomplete. Here we show that this therapeutic failure is rooted in a fundamental paradox: while TGFβ promotes malignant traits in gastric cancer, many cancer cells remain sensitive to its potent tumor-suppressive effects. We uncover that this suppression works by impairing the cell’s energy metabolism through modulating dihydrolipoamide dehydrogenase (DLD). Therefore, broadly blocking the TGFβ pathway can inadvertently release a natural brake on tumor growth. Based on this insight, we demonstrate that co-targeting this metabolic vulnerability with an inhibitor (devimistat) alongside an anti-TGFβ agent significantly enhances therapeutic efficacy in gastric cancer models. This combination approach presents a promising strategy to overcome the limitations of current therapies. The role of TGFβ in cancer is paradoxical and context-dependent. Here, the authors discover that a preserved, DLD-mediated metabolic suppression by TGFβ undermines anti-TGFβ therapy, promoting gastric cancer growth.

Drug Discovery.title_cn: 胃癌中，通过DLD介导的代谢调节，保留的TGFβ细胞生长抑制作用削弱了抗TGFβ疗法
Drug Discovery.abstract_cn: 尽管转化生长因子-β (TGFβ) 通路在癌症进展中的作用已广为人知，但针对该通路的疗法在临床上大多以失败告终。这表明我们对TGFβ功能的理解尚不完全。本研究表明，这种治疗失败根源于一个基本悖论：尽管TGFβ在胃癌中促进恶性特征，但许多癌细胞仍对其强大的肿瘤抑制作用敏感。我们发现，这种抑制作用通过调节二氢硫辛酰胺脱氢酶 (DLD) 来损害细胞的能量代谢。因此，广泛阻断TGFβ通路可能会无意中解除对肿瘤生长的天然抑制。基于这一见解，我们证明了将一种抑制剂 (devimistat) 与抗TGFβ药物联合靶向这种代谢脆弱性，可显著提高胃癌模型中的治疗效果。这种联合治疗方法为克服当前疗法的局限性提供了一种有前景的策略。TGFβ在癌症中的作用是矛盾且具有背景依赖性的。本研究中，作者发现TGFβ通过DLD介导的保留的代谢抑制作用，削弱了抗TGFβ疗法，从而促进了胃癌的生长。

Drug Discovery.title: Glycerol-3-phosphate activates ChREBP, FGF21 transcription and lipogenesis in citrin deficiency
Drug Discovery.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01399-3In a mouse model of the rare disease citrin deficiency, the authors discovered that the accumulation of glycerol-3-phosphate leads to ChREBP activation and FGF21 induction. The study identifies glycerol-3-phosphate as a ChREBP-activating ligand, which could resolve paradoxes of FGF21 expression and clarify the logic of lipogenic transcription.
Drug Discovery.abstract: Citrin deficiency (CD) is caused by the inactivation of SLC25A13, a mitochondrial membrane protein required to move electrons from cytosolic NADH to the mitochondrial matrix in hepatocytes. People with CD do not like sweets. Here we show that SLC25A13 loss causes the accumulation of glycerol-3-phosphate (G3P), which activates the carbohydrate response element-binding protein (ChREBP) to transcribe FGF21, which acts in the brain to restrain intake of sweets and alcohol and to transcribe key genes driving lipogenesis. Mouse and human data suggest that G3P–ChREBP is a mechanistic component of the Randle Cycle that contributes to metabolic-dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease and forms part of a system that communicates metabolic states from the liver to the brain in a manner that alters food and alcohol choices. The data provide a framework for understanding FGF21 induction in varied conditions, suggest ways to develop FGF21-inducing drugs and suggest potential drug candidates for lean metabolic-dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease and support of urea cycle function in CD. In a mouse model of the rare disease citrin deficiency, the authors discovered that the accumulation of glycerol-3-phosphate leads to ChREBP activation and FGF21 induction. The study identifies glycerol-3-phosphate as a ChREBP-activating ligand, which could resolve paradoxes of FGF21 expression and clarify the logic of lipogenic transcription.

Drug Discovery.title: Multi-view fusion based on graph convolutional network with attention mechanism for predicting miRNA related to drugs
Drug Discovery.summary: by Nan Sheng, Yunzhi Liu, Ling Gao, Lei Wang, Lan Huang, Yan WangMicroRNAs (miRNAs) play crucial roles in cancer progression, invasion, and response to treatment, particularly in regulating anticancer drug resistance and sensitivity. Identifying potential human miRNA-drug associations (MDAs) that manifest as resistance or sensitivity relationships offers valuable insights for cancer treatment and drug development. With the growing availability of biological data, computational methods have emerged as powerful tools to complement experimental approaches. However, limited attention has been paid to computational prediction of MDAs. Furthermore, existing approaches typically rely on known MDA information, overlooking the valuable insights available from multi-source data related to miRNAs and drugs. In this study, we present a multi-view fusion-based graph convolutional network with attention mechanism (MGCNA) to predict miRNA-associated drug resistance/sensitivity. Specifically, MGCNA integrates macro- and micro- level information of miRNAs and drugs to construct multi-view node features from different perspectives. The proposed multi-view graph convolutional network (GCN) encoder obtains miRNA and disease features from different views and learns adaptive importance weights of the embedding using an attention mechanism. Extensive experiments on manually curated benchmark datasets demonstrate that MGCNA outperforms existing baseline methods. Case studies of two common drugs further establish MGCNA’s effectiveness in discovering novel MDAs.

Drug Discovery.title_cn: 基于注意力机制图卷积网络的多视图融合用于预测与药物相关的miRNA
Drug Discovery.abstract_cn: 微RNA (miRNA) 在癌症进展、侵袭和治疗反应中发挥着关键作用，尤其是在调节抗癌药物耐药性和敏感性方面。识别表现为耐药性或敏感性关系的人类miRNA-药物关联 (MDA) 为癌症治疗和药物开发提供了宝贵的见解。随着生物数据可用性的不断增长，计算方法已成为补充实验方法的强大工具。然而，对MDA的计算预测关注有限。此外，现有方法通常依赖于已知的MDA信息，忽略了来自miRNA和药物相关多源数据的宝贵见解。在本研究中，我们提出了一种基于注意力机制图卷积网络的多视图融合模型 (MGCNA)，用于预测与miRNA相关的药物耐药性/敏感性。具体而言，MGCNA整合了miRNA和药物的宏观和微观信息，从不同角度构建多视图节点特征。所提出的多视图图卷积网络 (GCN) 编码器从不同视图获取miRNA和疾病特征，并利用注意力机制学习嵌入的自适应重要性权重。在人工整理的基准数据集上进行的广泛实验表明，MGCNA优于现有基线方法。对两种常见药物的案例研究进一步证实了MGCNA在发现新型MDA方面的有效性。

Immunology.title: Microbial signals in primary and metastatic brain tumors
Immunology.summary: Nature Medicine, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41591-025-03957-4A combination of high-resolution spatial imaging, spatial proteomics and transcriptional data reveals sparse and heterogeneous bacterial signals in gliomas and brain metastases.
Immunology.abstract: Gliomas and brain metastases are associated with poor prognosis, necessitating a deeper understanding of brain tumor biology and the development of effective therapeutic strategies. Although our group and others have demonstrated microbial presence in various tumors, recent controversies regarding cancer-type-specific intratumoral microbiota emphasize the importance of rigorous, orthogonal validation. This prospective, multi-institutional study included a total of 243 samples from 221 patients, comprising 168 glioma and brain metastases samples and 75 non-cancerous or tumor-adjacent tissues. Using stringent fluorescence in situ hybridization, immunohistochemistry and high-resolution spatial imaging, we detected intracellular bacterial 16S rRNA and lipopolysaccharides in both glioma and brain metastases samples, localized to tumor, immune and stromal cells. Custom 16S and metagenomic sequencing workflows identified taxa associated with intratumoral bacterial signals in the tumor microenvironment; however, standard culture methods did not yield readily cultivable microbiota. Spatial analyses revealed significant correlations between bacterial 16S signals and antimicrobial and immunometabolic signatures at regional, neighborhood and cellular levels. Furthermore, intratumoral 16S bacterial signals showed sequence overlap with matched oral and gut microbiota, suggesting a possible connection with distant communities. Together, these findings introduce microbial elements as a component of the brain tumor microenvironment and lay the foundation for future mechanistic and translational studies. A combination of high-resolution spatial imaging, spatial proteomics and transcriptional data reveals sparse and heterogeneous bacterial signals in gliomas and brain metastases.

Immunology.title_cn: 原发性和转移性脑肿瘤中的微生物信号
Immunology.abstract_cn: 胶质瘤和脑转移瘤预后不良，因此需要更深入地了解脑肿瘤生物学并开发有效的治疗策略。尽管我们课题组和其他研究者已证实多种肿瘤中存在微生物，但近期关于癌症类型特异性瘤内微生物群的争议，凸显了严格正交验证的重要性。这项前瞻性、多机构研究共纳入了221名患者的243份样本，其中包括168份胶质瘤和脑转移瘤样本，以及75份非癌或肿瘤邻近组织样本。通过严格的荧光原位杂交、免疫组织化学和高分辨率空间成像技术，我们在胶质瘤和脑转移瘤样本中检测到细胞内细菌16S rRNA和脂多糖，它们定位于肿瘤细胞、免疫细胞和基质细胞。定制的16S和宏基因组测序流程识别出肿瘤微环境中与瘤内细菌信号相关的分类群；然而，标准培养方法未能获得易于培养的微生物群。空间分析揭示了细菌16S信号与区域、邻近和细胞水平上的抗菌和免疫代谢特征之间存在显著关联。此外，瘤内16S细菌信号与匹配的口腔和肠道微生物群显示出序列重叠，这表明可能与远端微生物群落存在联系。总而言之，这些发现将微生物元素引入作为脑肿瘤微环境的一个组成部分，并为未来的机制和转化研究奠定了基础。高分辨率空间成像、空间蛋白质组学和转录组数据的结合揭示了胶质瘤和脑转移瘤中稀疏且异质的细菌信号。

Immunology.title: Genome-wide association study and polygenic risk prediction of hypothyroidism
Immunology.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02410-zLarge-scale genome-wide analyses identify hundreds of genetic loci associated with hypothyroidism and thyroid hormone levels, demonstrating the potential of using polygenic risk scores to predict disease onset and progression.
Immunology.abstract: We performed a genome-wide meta-analysis of hypothyroidism (113,393 cases and 1,065,268 controls), free thyroxine (191,449 individuals) and thyroid-stimulating hormone (482,873 individuals). We identified 350 loci associated with hypothyroidism, including 179 not previously reported, 29 of which were linked through thyroid-stimulating hormone. We found that many hypothyroidism risk loci regulate blood cell counts and the circulating inflammasome, and through multiple gene-mapping strategies, we prioritized 259 putative causal genes enriched in immune-related functions. We developed a polygenic risk score (PRS) based on more than 115,000 hypothyroidism cases to address diagnostic challenges in individuals with or at risk of thyroid hormone deficiency. We show that the highest predictive accuracy for hypothyroidism was achieved when combining the PRS with thyroid hormones and thyroid-peroxidase autoantibodies, and that the PRS was able to stratify risk of progression among individuals with subclinical hypothyroidism. These findings demonstrate the potential for a hypothyroidism PRS to support the prediction of disease progression and onset in thyroid hormone deficiency. Large-scale genome-wide analyses identify hundreds of genetic loci associated with hypothyroidism and thyroid hormone levels, demonstrating the potential of using polygenic risk scores to predict disease onset and progression.

Immunology.title_cn: 甲状腺功能减退症的全基因组关联研究与多基因风险预测
Immunology.abstract_cn: 我们对甲状腺功能减退症（113,393例病例和1,065,268例对照）、游离甲状腺素（191,449名个体）和促甲状腺激素（482,873名个体）进行了全基因组荟萃分析。我们鉴定出350个与甲状腺功能减退症相关的基因座，其中179个为首次报道，有29个通过促甲状腺激素关联。我们发现许多甲状腺功能减退症风险基因座调控血细胞计数和循环炎性体，并通过多种基因定位策略，优先筛选出259个富集于免疫相关功能的推定致病基因。我们基于超过115,000例甲状腺功能减退症病例开发了一个多基因风险评分（PRS），以解决甲状腺激素缺乏症患者或高危人群的诊断挑战。研究表明，将PRS与甲状腺激素和甲状腺过氧化物酶自身抗体结合使用时，甲状腺功能减退症的预测准确性最高；并且PRS能够对亚临床甲状腺功能减退症患者的疾病进展风险进行分层。这些发现表明，甲状腺功能减退症PRS在支持甲状腺激素缺乏症的疾病进展和发病预测方面具有潜力。大规模全基因组分析识别出数百个与甲状腺功能减退症和甲状腺激素水平相关的遗传基因座，这表明使用多基因风险评分预测疾病发生和进展的潜力。

Immunology.title: Different antigenic distance metrics generate similar predictions of influenza vaccine response breadth despite moderate correlation
Immunology.summary: by W. Zane Billings, Yang Ge, Amanda L. Skarlupka, Savannah L. Miller, Hayley Hemme, Murphy John, Natalie E. Dean, Sarah Cobey, Benjamin J. Cowling, Ye Shen, Ted M. Ross, Andreas HandelIntroductionInfluenza continuously evolves to escape population immunity, which makes formulating a vaccine challenging. Antigenic differences between vaccine strains and circulating strains can affect vaccine effectiveness (VE). Quantifying the antigenic difference between vaccine strains and circulating strains can aid interpretation of VE, and several antigenic distance metrics have been discussed in the literature. Here, we compare how the predicted breadth of vaccine-induced antibody response varies when different metrics are used to calculate antigenic distance.MethodsWe analyzed data from a seasonal influenza vaccine cohort that collected serum samples from 2013/14 – 2017/18 at three study sites. The data include pre- and post-vaccination HAI titers to the vaccine strains and a panel of heterologous strains. We used that data to calculate four different antigenic distance measures between assay strains and vaccine strains: difference in year of isolation (temporal),p-Epitope (sequence), Grantham’s distance (biophysical), and antigenic cartography distance (serological). We analyzed agreement between the four metrics using Spearman’s correlation and intraclass correlation. We then fit Bayesian generalized additive mixed-effects models to predict the effect of antigenic distance on post-vaccination titer after controlling for confounders and analyzed the pairwise difference in predictions between metrics.ResultsThe four antigenic distance metrics had low or moderate correlation for influenza subtypes A(H1N1), B/Victoria, and B/Yamagata. A(H3N2) distances were highly correlated. We found that after accounting for pre-vaccination titer, study site, and repeated measurements across individuals, the predicted post-vaccination titers conditional on antigenic distance and subtype were nearly identical across antigenic distance metrics, with A(H1N1) showing the only notable deviation between metrics.DiscussionDespite moderate correlation among metrics, we found that different antigenic distance metrics generated similar predictions about breadth of vaccine response. Costly titer assays for antigenic cartography may not be needed when simpler sequence-based metrics suffice for quantifying vaccine breadth.

Immunology.title_cn: 尽管存在中度相关性，但不同的抗原距离度量方法对流感疫苗应答广度的预测相似
Immunology.abstract_cn:
引言：流感病毒持续进化以逃避群体免疫，这使得疫苗的研制充满挑战。疫苗株与流行株之间的抗原差异会影响疫苗有效性（VE）。量化疫苗株与流行株之间的抗原差异有助于解释疫苗有效性，文献中已讨论了几种抗原距离度量方法。本研究比较了当使用不同度量方法计算抗原距离时，疫苗诱导抗体应答的预测广度如何变化。
方法：我们分析了来自一个季节性流感疫苗队列的数据，该队列在2013/14至2017/18年间在三个研究地点收集了血清样本。这些数据包括接种疫苗前后的血凝抑制（HAI）滴度，针对疫苗株和一组异源株。我们利用这些数据计算了检测株与疫苗株之间的四种不同抗原距离度量：分离年份差异（时间）、p-表位（序列）、格兰瑟姆距离（生物物理）和抗原图谱距离（血清学）。我们使用斯皮尔曼相关系数和组内相关系数分析了这四种度量方法之间的一致性。随后，我们拟合了贝叶斯广义加性混合效应模型，以预测在控制混杂因素后抗原距离对接种后滴度的影响，并分析了不同度量方法之间预测结果的成对差异。
结果：对于A(H1N1)、B/Victoria和B/Yamagata流感亚型，这四种抗原距离度量方法的相关性较低或中等。A(H3N2)的距离高度相关。我们发现，在考虑了接种前滴度、研究地点和个体间重复测量后，在给定抗原距离和亚型的情况下，不同抗原距离度量方法预测的接种后滴度几乎相同，仅A(H1N1)在不同度量方法之间显示出显著偏差。
讨论：尽管这些度量方法之间存在中度相关性，但我们发现不同的抗原距离度量方法对疫苗应答广度的预测相似。当更简单的基于序列的度量方法足以量化疫苗广度时，昂贵的抗原图谱滴度检测可能并非必需。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Genome-wide association study and polygenic risk prediction of hypothyroidism
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02410-zLarge-scale genome-wide analyses identify hundreds of genetic loci associated with hypothyroidism and thyroid hormone levels, demonstrating the potential of using polygenic risk scores to predict disease onset and progression.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: We performed a genome-wide meta-analysis of hypothyroidism (113,393 cases and 1,065,268 controls), free thyroxine (191,449 individuals) and thyroid-stimulating hormone (482,873 individuals). We identified 350 loci associated with hypothyroidism, including 179 not previously reported, 29 of which were linked through thyroid-stimulating hormone. We found that many hypothyroidism risk loci regulate blood cell counts and the circulating inflammasome, and through multiple gene-mapping strategies, we prioritized 259 putative causal genes enriched in immune-related functions. We developed a polygenic risk score (PRS) based on more than 115,000 hypothyroidism cases to address diagnostic challenges in individuals with or at risk of thyroid hormone deficiency. We show that the highest predictive accuracy for hypothyroidism was achieved when combining the PRS with thyroid hormones and thyroid-peroxidase autoantibodies, and that the PRS was able to stratify risk of progression among individuals with subclinical hypothyroidism. These findings demonstrate the potential for a hypothyroidism PRS to support the prediction of disease progression and onset in thyroid hormone deficiency. Large-scale genome-wide analyses identify hundreds of genetic loci associated with hypothyroidism and thyroid hormone levels, demonstrating the potential of using polygenic risk scores to predict disease onset and progression.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Uniform dynamics of cohesin-mediated loop extrusion in living human cells
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02406-9Live-cell fluorescence microscopy and polymer simulations in human HCT116 cells show similar cohesin density, residence times and extrusion speed across multiple genomic regions.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Most animal genomes are partitioned into topologically associating domains (TADs), created by cohesin-mediated loop extrusion and defined by convergently oriented CCCTC-binding factor (CTCF) sites. The dynamics of loop extrusion and its regulation remain poorly characterized in vivo. Here we tracked the motion of TAD anchors in living human cells to visualize and quantify cohesin-dependent loop extrusion across multiple endogenous genomic regions. We show that TADs are dynamic structures whose anchors are brought in proximity about once per hour and for 6–19 min (~16% of the time). Moreover, TADs are continuously extruded by multiple cohesin complexes. Remarkably, despite strong differences in Hi-C patterns across chromatin regions, their dynamics is consistent with the same density, residence time and speed of cohesin. Our results suggest that TAD dynamics is primarily governed by the location and affinity of CTCF sites, enabling genome-wide predictive models of cohesin-dependent chromatin interactions. Live-cell fluorescence microscopy and polymer simulations in human HCT116 cells show similar cohesin density, residence times and extrusion speed across multiple genomic regions.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 黏连蛋白介导的环挤出在活体人细胞中的统一动态
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 大多数动物基因组被划分为拓扑关联结构域（TADs），这些结构域由黏连蛋白介导的环挤出形成，并由会聚定向的CCCTC结合因子（CTCF）位点界定。环挤出的动态及其调控在体内仍未得到充分表征。本研究中，我们追踪了活体人细胞中TAD锚点的运动，以可视化并量化多个内源性基因组区域中黏连蛋白依赖的环挤出。我们发现TADs是动态结构，其锚点大约每小时接近一次，并维持6-19分钟（约占总时间的16%）。此外，TADs由多个黏连蛋白复合物持续挤出。值得注意的是，尽管染色质区域间的Hi-C模式存在显著差异，但它们的动态与黏连蛋白的相同密度、驻留时间和挤出速度保持一致。我们的结果表明，TAD动态主要受CTCF位点的位置和亲和力调控，从而能够建立黏连蛋白依赖性染色质相互作用的全基因组预测模型。在人HCT116细胞中进行的活细胞荧光显微镜和聚合物模拟显示，黏连蛋白在多个基因组区域的密度、驻留时间和挤出速度相似。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Exploring the concept of bacterial memory
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Microbiology, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41564-025-02185-3This Perspective discusses the concept, mechanisms and evidence for memory in bacteria at individual and community levels.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Bacteria have multiple mechanisms through which they sense changes in their environment and respond appropriately. In some instances, bacteria appear to retain an imprint of past events that can influence future behaviour, resembling a form of memory. This Perspective explores this concept of bacterial memory at the genetic, epigenetic, biochemical and ecological levels. We discuss how memory can prime bacteria to respond appropriately to recurring stimuli, providing fitness benefits in fluctuating environments. At the cellular level, there is evidence for memory storage mechanisms involving mutations, DNA methylation, or the inheritance of metabolites or proteins that provide a means of accessing past experiences. Complex bacterial communities can exhibit ecological memories of past environments, stored as microbiota population changes that persist or lag after acute environmental change. We review the emerging evidence supporting these concepts of microbial memory, outline some of the key molecular mechanisms, and identify research gaps and potential future applications. This Perspective discusses the concept, mechanisms and evidence for memory in bacteria at individual and community levels.

Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 细菌拥有多种机制来感知环境变化并做出适当响应。在某些情况下，细菌似乎能保留过往事件的印记，这些印记可以影响其未来的行为，类似于一种记忆形式。本综述从遗传、表观遗传、生化和生态层面探讨了细菌记忆这一概念。我们讨论了记忆如何使细菌预先做好准备，以适当响应重复出现的刺激，从而在波动环境中提供适应性优势。在细胞层面，有证据表明记忆存储机制涉及突变、DNA甲基化，或代谢物或蛋白质的遗传，这些机制提供了获取过往经验的途径。复杂的细菌群落可以表现出对过去环境的生态记忆，这些记忆以微生物群落组成变化的形式储存，并在急性环境变化后持续存在或滞后。我们回顾了支持这些微生物记忆概念的新兴证据，概述了一些关键的分子机制，并指出了研究空白和潜在的未来应用。本综述讨论了细菌在个体和群落层面的记忆概念、机制和证据。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Spatial close-kin mark-recapture methods to estimate dispersal parameters and barrier strength for mosquitoes
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: by John M. Marshall, Shuyi Yang, Jared B. Bennett, Igor Filipović, Gordana RašićClose-kin mark-recapture (CKMR) methods have recently been used to infer demographic parameters for several aquatic and terrestrial species. For mosquitoes, the spatial distribution of close-kin pairs has been used to estimate mean dispersal distance, of relevance to vector-borne disease transmission and genetic biocontrol strategies. Close-kin methods have advantages over traditional mark-release-recapture (MRR) methods as the mark is genetic, removing the need for physical marking and recapturing that may interfere with movement behavior. Here, we extend CKMR methods to accommodate spatial structure alongside life history for mosquitoes and comparable insects. We derive kinship probabilities for parent-offspring and full-sibling pairs in a spatial context, where an individual in each pair may be a larva or adult. Using the dengue vectorAedes aegyptias a case study, we use an individual-based model of mosquito life history to test the effectiveness of this approach at estimating parameters such as mean dispersal distance, daily staying probability, and the strength of a barrier to movement. Considering a simulated population of 9,025 adult mosquitoes arranged on a 19-by-19 grid, we find the CKMR approach provides unbiased and precise estimates of mean dispersal distance given a total of 2,500 adult females sampled over a three-month period using 25 traps evenly spread throughout the landscape. The CKMR approach is also able to estimate parameters of more complex dispersal kernels, such as the daily staying probability of a zero-inflated exponential kernel, or the strength of a barrier to movement, provided the magnitude of these parameters is greater than 0.5. These results suggest that CKMR provides an insightful characterization of mosquito dispersal that is complementary to conventional MRR methods.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 估算蚊虫扩散参数和屏障强度的空间近亲标记重捕方法
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 近亲标记重捕（CKMR）方法最近已被用于推断多种水生和陆生生物的种群统计学参数。对于蚊虫而言，近亲对的空间分布已被用于估算平均扩散距离，这与媒介传播疾病的传播和基因生物防治策略密切相关。相较于传统的标记-释放-重捕（MRR）方法，近亲方法具有优势，因为其标记是遗传性的，从而避免了可能干扰运动行为的物理标记和重捕需求。本文中，我们扩展了CKMR方法，使其能够同时考虑蚊虫及类似昆虫的空间结构和生活史。我们推导了空间背景下亲子对和全同胞对的亲缘关系概率，其中每对中的个体可以是幼虫或成虫。我们以登革热媒介埃及伊蚊为例，利用蚊虫生活史的个体为基础模型，检验了该方法在估算平均扩散距离、每日停留概率以及运动屏障强度等参数方面的有效性。考虑到一个由9,025只成年蚊虫组成的模拟种群，它们排列在一个19x19的网格上，我们发现，在三个月内使用25个均匀分布在整个区域的诱捕器共采样2,500只成年雌蚊的情况下，CKMR方法能够提供平均扩散距离的无偏且精确的估计。CKMR方法还能够估算更复杂扩散核的参数，例如零膨胀指数核的每日停留概率，或运动屏障的强度，前提是这些参数的量级大于0.5。这些结果表明，CKMR为蚊虫扩散提供了一种富有洞察力的表征，与传统的MRR方法互为补充。

Bennett, Igor Filipović, Gordana RašićClose-kin mark-recapture (CKMR) methods have recently been used to infer demographic parameters for several aquatic and terrestrial species. We derive kinship probabilities for parent-offspring and full-sibling pairs in a spatial context, where an individual in each pair may be a larva or adult. The CKMR approach is also able to estimate parameters of more complex dispersal kernels, such as the daily staying probability of a zero-inflated exponential kernel, or the strength of a barrier to movement, provided the magnitude of these parameters is greater than 0.5. These results suggest that CKMR provides an insightful characterization of mosquito dispersal that is complementary to conventional MRR methods.

Plants.title: Cambium LBDs promote radial growth by regulating PLL-mediated pectin metabolism
Plants.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 14 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02151-1This study reveals that LBD transcription factors in the cambium drive radial plant growth by regulating PECTATE LYASE-LIKE (PLL) enzymes that remodel cell wall pectin, promoting cell expansion.
Plants.abstract: Plant growth originates from the interlinked action of cell division and cell growth. During radial growth of secondary tissues, bifacial cambial stem cells grow and divide to produce xylem and phloem precursors, which subsequently undergo expansion characteristic of their respective differentiation processes. In Arabidopsis roots, cytokinins and four downstream LATERAL ORGAN BOUNDARIES DOMAIN (LBD) transcription factors are key players in promoting radial growth, though the underlying mechanisms remain unknown. Here our results indicate that these LBD genes primarily regulate cell growth rather than proliferation. Through a large-scale CRISPR–Cas9-aided reverse genetic screen, we identified a set of PECTATE LYASE-LIKE (PLL) genes that function downstream of cytokinin and the LBDs in the regulation of radial growth. We show that at least one of these PLLs, PLL18, possesses pectate lyase activity. In accordance with this activity, PLLs and LBDs promote radial growth by modifying the pectin composition and mechanical properties of the primary cell wall. Our findings thus connect the central role of cytokinins in radial growth with cell wall remodelling and pave a way for further research on hormone-mediated plant growth regulation and cell wall metabolism. This study reveals that LBD transcription factors in the cambium drive radial plant growth by regulating PECTATE LYASE-LIKE (PLL) enzymes that remodel cell wall pectin, promoting cell expansion.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: by Sankarasubramanian Jagadesan, Chittibabu GudaSingle-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) technology has revolutionized biological research by enabling a through exploration of cellular heterogeneity. However, the complexity of data processing pipelines and the need for programming expertise create barriers for many biologists to explore scRNA-seq data. To address this, we developed Single-cell RNA Data Analysis and Visualization (ScRDAVis), an interactive, browser-based R Shiny application tailored for biologists with no programming expertise. ScRDAVis integrates widely used analysis packages, such asSeurat,CellChat,Monocle3,clusterProfilerandhdWGCNAto provide a user-friendly interface for single-cell data analysis. The application supports single-sample, multiple-sample and group-based analyses, along with features such as marker discovery, cell type annotation, subclustering analysis, and advanced functional studies. Key functionalities include cell-cell communication analysis, trajectory and pseudotime inference, pathway enrichment analysis, weighted gene co-expression network analysis (WGCNA), and transcription factor (TF) regulatory network analysis. ScRDAVis stands out as the first GUI-based platform offering hdWGCNA for co-expression network and TF regulatory network analysis using scRNA-seq data. ScRDAVis provides publication-ready visualizations with data download options in different formats empowering researchers to extract meaningful biological insights and democratizing the analytical capabilities required to comprehensively analyze scRNA-seq studies. ScRDAVis can be freely downloaded from GitHub at https://github.com/GudaLab/ScRDAVis or accessed from any browser at https://www.gudalab-rtools.net/ScRDAVis.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Library size-stabilized metacells construction enhances co-expression network analysis in single-cell data
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: by Tianjiao Zhang, Haibin ZhuSingle-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) deciphers cell type-specific co-expression networks to resolve biological functions but remains constrained by data sparsity and compositional biases. Conventional metacells construction strategies mitigate sparsity by aggregating transcriptionally similar cells but often neglect systematic biases introduced by compositional data. This problem leads to spurious co-expression correlations and obscuring biologically meaningful interactions. Through mathematical modeling and simulations, we demonstrate that uncontrolled library size variance in traditional metacells inflates false-positive correlations and distorts co-expression networks. Here, we present LSMetacell (Library Size-stabilized Metacells), a computational framework that explicitly stabilizes library sizes across metacells to reduce compositional noise while preserving cellular heterogeneity. LSMetacell addresses this by stabilizing library sizes during metacells aggregation, thereby enhancing the accuracy of downstream analyses such as Weighted Gene Co-expression Network Analysis (WGCNA). Applied to a postmortem Alzheimer’s disease brain scRNA-seq dataset, LSMetacell revealed robust, cell type-specific co-expression modules enriched for disease-relevant pathways, outperforming the conventional metacells approach. Our work establishes a principled strategy for resolving compositional biases in scRNA-seq data, advancing the reliability of co-expression network inference in studying complex biological systems. This framework provides a generalizable solution for improving transcriptional analyses in single-cell studies.

Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）能够解析细胞类型特异性共表达网络以阐明生物学功能，但仍受数据稀疏性和组成偏差的限制。传统的元细胞构建策略通过聚合转录相似的细胞来缓解稀疏性，但通常忽略了由组成型数据引入的系统性偏差。这个问题导致虚假的共表达相关性，并掩盖了具有生物学意义的相互作用。通过数学建模和模拟，我们证明了传统元细胞中不受控制的文库大小变异会增加假阳性相关性并扭曲共表达网络。在此，我们提出了LSMetacell（文库大小稳定化元细胞），这是一个计算框架，它明确地稳定了元细胞间的文库大小，以减少组成噪声，同时保留了细胞异质性。LSMetacell通过在元细胞聚合过程中稳定文库大小来解决这个问题，从而提高了下游分析（如加权基因共表达网络分析（WGCNA））的准确性。将LSMetacell应用于一份死后阿尔茨海默病脑部scRNA-seq数据集，它揭示了稳健的、细胞类型特异性的共表达模块，这些模块富集了与疾病相关的通路，并且优于传统的元细胞方法。我们的工作建立了一种解决scRNA-seq数据中组成偏差的原则性策略，提高了在研究复杂生物系统中共表达网络推断的可靠性。该框架为改进单细胞研究中的转录分析提供了一个通用解决方案。

Neuroscience.title: Stimulus-to-stimulus learning in RNNs with cortical inductive biases
Neuroscience.summary: by Pantelis Vafidis, Antonio RangelAnimals learn to predict external contingencies from experience through a process of conditioning. A natural mechanism for conditioning is stimulus substitution, whereby the neuronal response to the CS becomes increasingly identical to that of the US. We propose a recurrent neural network model of stimulus substitution which leverages two forms of inductive bias pervasive in the cortex: representational inductive bias in the form of mixed stimulus representations, and architectural inductive bias in the form of two-compartment pyramidal neurons that have been shown to serve as a fundamental unit of cortical associative learning. The properties of these neurons allow for a biologically plausible learning rule that implements stimulus substitution, utilizing only information available locally at the synapses. We show that the model generates a wide array of conditioning phenomena, and can learn large numbers of associations with an amount of training commensurate with animal experiments, without relying on parameter fine-tuning for each individual experimental task. In contrast, we show that commonly used Hebbian rules fail to learn generic stimulus-stimulus associations with mixed selectivity, and require task-specific parameter fine-tuning. Our framework highlights the importance of multi-compartment neuronal processing in the cortex, and showcases how it might confer cortical animals the evolutionary edge.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 具有皮层归纳偏置的循环神经网络中的刺激关联学习
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 动物通过条件反射过程，从经验中学习预测外部偶发事件。条件反射的一种自然机制是刺激替代，即条件刺激（CS）引起的神经元反应与非条件刺激（US）的反应变得越来越相似。我们提出了一种刺激替代的循环神经网络模型，该模型利用了皮层中普遍存在的两种归纳偏置：以混合刺激表征形式存在的表征归纳偏置，以及以双区锥体神经元形式存在的架构归纳偏置。这些双区锥体神经元已被证明是皮层联想学习的基本单元。这些神经元的特性使得一种生物学上合理的学习规则得以实现，该规则执行刺激替代，并且仅利用突触局部可用的信息。我们展示了该模型能够生成多种条件反射现象，并且能够学习大量关联，其训练量与动物实验相当，而无需针对每个单独的实验任务进行参数微调。相比之下，我们发现常用的赫布规则（Hebbian rules）无法学习具有混合选择性的通用刺激-刺激关联，并且需要针对特定任务进行参数微调。我们的框架强调了皮层中多区神经元处理的重要性，并展示了它如何赋予皮层动物进化优势。

Neuroscience.title: The topology of synergy: Linking topological and information-theoretic approaches to higher-order interactions in complex systems
Neuroscience.summary: by Thomas F. Varley, Pedro A. M. Mediano, Alice Patania, Josh BongardThe study of irreducible higher-order interactions has become a core topic of study in complex systems, as they provide a formal scaffold around which to build a quantitative understanding of emergence and emergent properties. Two of the most well-developed frameworks, topological data analysis and multivariate information theory, aim to provide formal tools for identifying higher-order interactions in empirical data. Despite similar aims, however, these two approaches are built on markedly different mathematical foundations and have been developed largely in parallel - with limited interdisciplinary cross-talk between them. In this study, we present a head-to-head comparison of topological data analysis and information-theoretic approaches to describing higher-order interactions in multivariate data; with the goal of assessing the similarities, and differences, between how the frameworks define “higher-order structures.” We begin with toy examples with known topologies (spheres, toroids, planes, and knots), before turning to more complex, naturalistic data: fMRI signals collected from the human brain. We find that intrinsic, higher-order synergistic information is associated with three-dimensional cavities in an embedded point cloud: shapes such as spheres and hollow toroids are synergy-dominated, regardless of how the data is rotated. In fMRI data, we find strong correlations between synergistic information and both the number and size of three-dimensional cavities. Furthermore, we find that dimensionality reduction techniques such as PCA preferentially represent higher-order redundancies, and largely fail to preserve both higher-order information and topological structure, suggesting that common manifold-based approaches to studying high-dimensional data are systematically failing to identify important features of the data. These results point towards the possibility of developing a rich theory of higher-order interactions that spans topological and information-theoretic approaches while simultaneously highlighting the profound limitations of more conventional methods.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 协同性的拓扑学：联结拓扑学与信息论方法解析复杂系统中的高阶相互作用
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 不可约高阶相互作用的研究已成为复杂系统中的核心课题，因为它们为构建对涌现现象和涌现特性的定量理解提供了形式化框架。拓扑数据分析和多元信息论是其中两个发展最为完善的框架，它们旨在为识别经验数据中的高阶相互作用提供形式化工具。然而，尽管目标相似，这两种方法却建立在截然不同的数学基础之上，且在很大程度上是并行发展的，彼此间的跨学科交流有限。本研究对拓扑数据分析和信息论方法在描述多元数据中高阶相互作用方面的异同进行了直接比较，旨在评估这两种框架在定义“高阶结构”上的异同。我们首先使用已知拓扑结构（如球体、环面、平面和结）的玩具示例进行分析，随后转向更复杂的真实数据：从人脑中采集的功能性磁共振成像（fMRI）信号。我们发现，内在的高阶协同信息与嵌入点云中的三维空腔相关联：球体和中空环面等形状主要由协同作用主导，无论数据如何旋转。在fMRI数据中，我们发现协同信息与三维空腔的数量和大小之间存在强相关性。此外，我们发现主成分分析（PCA）等降维技术优先表示高阶冗余，并且在很大程度上未能保留高阶信息和拓扑结构，这表明研究高维数据的常见基于流形的方法系统性地未能识别数据的重要特征。这些结果表明，有可能发展出一种涵盖拓扑学和信息论方法的丰富的高阶相互作用理论，同时突显了传统方法的深远局限性。
